products.title: GTurbo 1GD-FTV Power-Pipe
products.description: Description GTurbo 1GD-FTV Power-Pipe – Maximum Flow, Maximum Potential The factory intake pipe on the Toyota 1GD-FTV diesel is undersized and restrictive, limiting the turbocharger’s ability to breathe freely. The GTurbo Power-Pipe solves this with a cast, bolt-on 3.5-inch inlet designed for maximum airflow and effortless performance gains. Engineered to be a direct fit, the Power-Pipe comes complete with our reinforced silicone connector to join seamlessly to the GTurbo High-Flow Airbox. The silicone section is internally supported with steel rings, preventing collapse or distortion under heavy load or high boost pressures. Why it matters A turbo that breathes easier doesn’t have to work as hard to make boost. That means: More power & torque – Unlock up to 220 kW and 700 Nm with supporting modifications, without the airflow bottlenecks of the factory pipe. Improved fuel efficiency – Reduced turbo effort can translate to better economy on and off-road. Lower intake temps – More efficient airflow helps keep temperatures in check, especially under sustained load. Key Features 3.5-inch cast alloy construction – Strong, precise, and smooth-flowing for maximum efficiency. Bolt-on fitment – No cutting or fabrication required. Steel-reinforced silicone connector – Maintains shape under pressure and heat, ensuring long-term reliability. Designed for performance builds – Supports high-flow GTurbo setups without restricting airflow. Whether you’re chasing peak numbers or simply want your 1GD-FTV to run cooler, stronger, and more efficiently, the GTurbo Power-Pipe is the missing link between your airbox and turbo. Suits GDJ70 N80 Hilix GDJ150 GDJ250
products.additionalInfo: Additional information Weight 5 kg Dimensions 44 × 31 × 18 cm Model N80 Hilux/fortuner, GDJ150, GDJ250, GDJ70 Airbox Type Suit GTurbo Airbox, Suit STD Airbox Colour Silver, Black

products.title: Toyota Landcruiser VD-G333 Titan Ball Bearing
products.description: Description GTurbo VD-G333 Titan Ball Bearing Introducing the GTurbo VD-G333 Titan Ball Bearing, the next evolution of our proven VD-G333 platform. Engineered with GTurbo’s latest Ball Bearing technology, this turbocharger delivers the same legendary power and durability as the original Titan, now with even faster spool, sharper transient response, and smoother power delivery throughout the rev range. Key Features: Advanced Aerodynamics:The VD-G333 Ball Bearing features updated aerodynamic design, optimising airflow for smoother, more powerful performance. Experience enhanced efficiency and power with every drive. Lower Inertia:With reduced inertia, the VD-G333 Ball Bearing delivers quicker spool times for rapid acceleration and immediate throttle response. Super Alloy Construction:The compressor wheel is made from a high-strength super alloy, ensuring exceptional durability under extreme conditions. TITAN Coating:The compressor wheel is finished with an aerospace-grade ultra-hard non-stick coating that reduces friction, improves resistance to heat and corrosion, and ensures long-term reliability. New Ball Bearing Core:The new Ball Bearing VD-G333 Titan variant delivers the same high-output capability as the journal-bearing model, with earlier response of up to 250+ RPM and exceptional transient performance.Ball bearings drastically reduce friction, allowing the turbo to maintain higher shaft speed when coming off throttle and recover boost pressure faster when power is reapplied.This results in a noticeably more responsive and versatile driving experience, especially in towing, off-road, and performance applications.GTurbo’s new ceramic bearing system has undergone extreme durability testing, including sustained 50 psi boost on a G400Ti-equipped drag Hilux producing over 450 whp, with zero bearing failures to date. Performance Expectations: The VD-G333 Ball Bearing designed boost rating is 30psi, operating efficiently from 16-33psi, with 30psi typically available from 1500rpm when the tune and setup are complementary. Accurate tuning is essential for reliability, efficiency, and performance. Standard performance for the VDJ70 series is around 380nm of wheel torque and 100-120rwkw. With the VD-G333 Ball Bearing combined with our custom remap, you can expect around 800-900nm of wheel torque and 190rwkw to 220rwkw. Installations of GTurbo Intercooler Fan Kit it or large intercooler, 3” exhaust, GTurbo Powerpipe (intake pipe), NPC1600Nm Clutch and upgraded injectors have yielded results as high as 260rwkw and torque over 1000nm at the wheels. Please note that the performance figures are based on using a turbo-back exhaust system. Performance will be slightly lower if the DPF is retained. This unit can be used as a direct replacement for the factory unit, with no modification required to the tune/ECU, and is designed to function optimally with or without the DPF. Supporting Modifications: Common supporting modifications include a GTurbo Intercooler Fan kit or PDI Front mount intercooler, exhaust upgrade, upgraded airbox, replacement turbo intake pipe (GTurbo Power Pipe), NPC1600Nm Clutch and GTurbo high-flow injectors. Free 1 Year Warranty included. 2 Years Warranty when installed alongside a GTune. products.title: Toyota Landcruiser HD-G333 Titan
products.description: Description Toyota Landcruiser HD-G333 Titan Introducing the GTurbo HD-G333 Titan, the latest evolution in turbocharger technology, replacing the renowned HD-G300 Green. Engineered with cutting-edge advancements, the HD-G333 Titan promises unmatched performance and durability for your vehicle. Key Features: Advanced Aerodynamics: The HD-G333 Titan features updated aerodynamics, optimising airflow for smoother, more powerful performance. Experience enhanced efficiency and power with every drive. Lower Inertia: With reduced inertia, the HD-G333 Titan delivers quicker spool times for rapid acceleration and immediate throttle response. Super Alloy: The compressor wheel is made from a super alloy, the HD-G333 Titan ensures exceptional strength and durability. This robust foundation guarantees longevity, even under extreme conditions. TITAN Coating: The Compressor wheel has an aerospace-grade ultra-hard non-stick coating. This advanced coating reduces friction, enhances resistance to high temperatures and corrosion, and ensures reliability. HD-G333 Titan Summary This turbocharger provides towing grunt, great response and amazing power all in one. Its design and boost is 24psi, preset to 18psi and can be operated efficiently from 10 – 33psi. Fitting a boost controller and boost gauge will allow you to increase boost over the preset to 20-25psi. 20psi is typically available from 1500rpm if the tune and setup are complementary. Free 1 Year Warranty included. Hd-G333 Titan Performance expectations The Dyno graph below showcases a comparison between: 1. Blue = HD-G300 Green wheel Tuned 2. Green = HD-G333 Titan with Green wheel Tune completely unchanged 3. Black = HD-G333 Titan Tuned to its maximum potential Disclaimer: The black graph is the turbo tuned beyond its warranted capability, as a proof of concept and its endurance. 1HD-T (HDJ80) Standard, the HDJ81 1HD-T produces 290Nm of wheel torque and 76-80rwkw. With a GTurbo HD-G333 Titan combined with a customised tune of the factory injection pump (while in car), you can expect 400-500 of Wheel torque and 115rwkw to 130rwkw. Boost should reach a minimum of 20psi at 1600rpm when tuned correctly. Installations with a large intercooler, 3” exhaust, custom injection pump and an upgraded air box and feed to turbo have yielded results as high as 155rwkw and torque over 600Nm at the wheels, and in these cases, 20psi may be reached at 1500rpm. 1HD-FT (HDJ80) Standard, the HDJ81 1HD-FT produces 295Nm of engine torque and 80-88rwkw. With a GTurbo HD-G333 Titan combined with a customised tune of the factory injection pump (while in car), you can expect 400-550 of wheel torque and 120rwkw to 135rwkw. Boost should reach a minimum of 20psi at 1600rpm. when tuned correctly. Installations with a large intercooler, 3” exhaust, custom injection pump and an upgraded air box and feed to turbo have yielded results as high as 160rwkw and torque 600+Nm at the wheels, and in these cases, 20psi may be reached at 1500rpm. 1HD-FTE (HDJ70 / HDJ100) Standard, the HDJ70 series produces 295Nm of Wheel torque and 90rwkW while the HDJ100 produces 380nm of wheel torque and 110-120rwkw. With a HD-G333 Titan combined with our custom-programmed Unichip, you can expect around 600nm of Wheel torque and 145rwkw to 155rwkw. Installations with a large intercooler(HDJ70)(HDJ100), 3” exhaust and an upgraded air box and feed to turbo have yielded results as high as 170rwkw and torque over 650Nm at the Wheels. Additionally, Installing plus 30% injectors will see results as high as 220kW and 800Nm of Torque at the wheels.

products.title: Toyota GDJ70/Hilux/Prado 2.8 1GD-FTV GD-G300 Titan Ball Bearing
products.description: Description Toyota GDJ70/Hilux/Prado 2.8 1GD-FTV GD-G300 Titan Ball Bearing Introducing the GTurbo GD-G300 Ball Bearing, the next-generation evolution of our GD-G300 Titan turbocharger. Built specifically for the 150kW 1GD-FTV engine, this high-performance upgrade combines the proven GD-G300 Titan compressor with a new ball bearing core and higher-flow turbine, delivering faster spool, stronger midrange torque, and enhanced reliability—perfect for towing, touring, and off-road adventure. G300-GD Ball Bearing provides unmatched midrange torque and faster boost response compared to the GD-G300 Titan, making it the ideal choice for responsive, real-world performance. Key Features: Advanced Aerodynamics: The GD-G300 Titan features updated aerodynamics, optimising airflow for smoother, more powerful performance. Experience enhanced efficiency and power with every drive. Lower Inertia: With reduced inertia, the GD-G300 Titan delivers quicker spool times for rapid acceleration and immediate throttle response. Feel the thrill of instantaneous power at your fingertips. Super Alloy Base: Built with a super alloy base, the GD-G300 Titan Titan ensures exceptional strength and durability. This robust foundation guarantees longevity, even under extreme conditions. TITAN Coating: The Compressor wheel has an aerospace-grade ultra-hard non-stick coating. This advanced coating reduces friction, enhances resistance to high temperatures and corrosion, and ensures reliability. Ball Bearing Core: Reduces rotational friction for quicker spool and sharper throttle response. Performance Expectations: The GD-G300 Ball Bearing is designed for 36psi of boost and operates efficiently between 16–36psi (at <40°C turbo intake temp and >95kPa intake pressure).When paired with a quality ECU tune and supporting modifications, you can expect the following real-world results: Factory Output (150kW 1GD-FTV): ~410Nm at the wheels / ~135rwkW With GD-G300 Ball Bearing + ECU Tune: ~550–600Nm / 160–170rwkW With Full Supporting Mods: Up to 700+Nm and 200+rwkW at the wheels Note: Performance figures are based on turbo-back exhaust systems. Vehicles retaining the factory DPF may experience slightly lower results. This turbo is compatible with both DPF-equipped and DPF-delete setups Supporting Modifications: Common supporting modifications include an upgraded Intercooler, exhaust upgrade, upgraded Airbox, induction plumbing, and GTurbo high-flow injectors. Free 1 Year Warranty included. 2 Years Warranty when installed alongside a GTune.

products.title: Toyota Hilux KD-G250 Titan
products.description: Description Toyota Hilux KD-G250 Titan Introducing the GTurbo KD-G250 Titan, the ultimate upgrade for your vehicle’s performance needs. Building on the legacy of the KD-G250 Green, the Titan version incorporates cutting-edge advancements to deliver unmatched power, responsiveness, and durability. Key Features: Advanced Aerodynamics: Optimised for superior airflow and enhanced efficiency. Lower Inertia: Provides rapid spool times and instant throttle response. Super Alloy Base: Ensures exceptional strength and durability. Aerospace-Grade Coating: Reduces friction, resists high temperatures and corrosion, ensuring long-lasting performance. Performance Expectations The KD-G250 Titan turbocharger targets great low-down response and efficient performance/boost throughout the rev range. It features a high-response turbine wheel, larger and more efficient compressor wheel, upgraded thrust bearings, a 30% stronger main shaft, and a higher flow VNT system. Designed for a boost of 28psi, it operates efficiently from 10-30psi, with optimal tuning at 28psi. With an upgraded intercooler and ECU tune, expect power increases to around 140-150rwkW and torque to 500nm. Installations with a larger intercooler, 3” exhaust, and upgraded injectors can yield up to 180rwkW and over 650nm at the wheels. An upgraded clutch is mandatory for manual transmissions. Packages KD-G250 Titan Turbo: $2990 exchange Turbo and Tune: $5500 drive-in drive-out High-Flow Add-ons: $2000 installed or $4100 for new units installed Common supporting modifications include an exhaust upgrade, front mount intercooler, upgraded air box, and high-flow injectors. Contact us to discuss the best upgrade options for your vehicle. 1 Year Warranty on all products. Additional costs apply for tuning and installation. products.title: GTurbo 300 Series Upgraded Intercooler/Heat Exchanger
products.description: Description Enhance your Land Cruiser 300 series with the GTurbo Upgraded Intercooler/Heat Exchanger. Essential for maintaining optimal intake temperatures while towing, this water-to-air intercooler upgrade is crucial for preserving power and torque under heavy loads. As Land Cruiser enthusiasts, we understand that the 300 series is built to handle just about anything. However, when pushing the limits, efficient heat dissipation is vital. The GTurbo heat exchanger upgrade addresses the shortcomings of factory intercoolers, which can struggle with heat soak and reduced cooling efficiency during demanding tasks. This upgrade ensures your engine remains cool, even in extreme conditions, preventing power loss and maintaining peak performance. The GTurbo heat exchanger seamlessly integrates with your Land Cruiser’s existing cooling system, enhancing its water-to-air cooling capacity. This means you can tow heavy loads or tackle tough off-road terrains without worrying about overheating or reduced engine performance. The upgrade is designed for straightforward installation and works perfectly with both stock and modified vehicles. Key benefits of the GTurbo heat exchanger include: Enhanced Power and Torque: Maintain peak performance and efficient towing capabilities, even with heavy loads. Stabilisation of Engine Temperatures: Prevent overheating and ensure stable intake and intercooler temperatures for a more efficient drive. Easy Installation: Compatible with factory-standard F33A-FTV engines and other performance enhancements. Improved Towing: Enjoy safer, more effective towing with reduced intake temperatures and stable torque output. Long-term Engine Protection: Reduce wear and tear by maintaining optimal temperatures, extending the life of your engine. Upgrade to the GTurbo Intercooler/Heat Exchanger for a reliable, high-performance solution that keeps your Land Cruiser 300 series running at its best, no matter the challenge.

products.title: Toyota Landcruiser VDJ76,78,79 Manta Air Ram Head 3.5″
products.description: Description Toyota Landcruiser VDJ76,78,79 Manta Air Ram Head 3.5″ A replacement for the standard round “mushroom style” snorkel top found on the original Toyota snorkel fitted to most Landcruisers. While not only improving the appearance of the vehicle, the cobra-style air ram has a ram effect at highway speeds. It helps force the incoming air down into the motor, giving the Landcruiser increased responsiveness, and allowing the engine to breathe easier. The air ram is noticeably quieter at highway speeds than the factory Toyota snorkel head. A vent at the rear of the snorkel head ensures an exit for water during driving in rain. The Manta Air Ram is a simple 5 minute install, retaining the use of the factory clamping system. Just loosen the clamp, remove the old snorkel head, replace it with the new air ram, tighten the clamp, and away you go! Height: 145mm exc. snorkel insert section

products.title: GTurbo Freudenberg High Efficiency Air Filter
products.description: Description GTurbo Freudenberg High Efficiency Air Filter Precision Filtration | High Flow | Engine Protection GTurbo has partnered with Freudenberg and Scavenger to develop the ultimate high-performance filter system, delivering exceptional airflow without compromising filtration. Designed for Australia’s harsh off-road conditions, this filter captures even the finest dust while maintaining superior flow for tuned and high-output engines. Key Features Advanced Multi-Layered Media: Utilises Freudenberg’s latest synthetic fibre technology with electrostatic surface charging to trap both coarse dust and sub-micron particles that standard filters miss. High Flow Efficiency: Engineered to optimise intake flow, supporting greater power and throttle response in both stock and tuned applications. Durable Construction: Built for longevity and repeated service intervals, the Scavenger filter media maintains its structure and performance in extreme heat, vibration, and dusty conditions. Why It’s Needed Factory filters struggle to balance airflow and filtration, restricting performance or allowing dust to pass in fine desert conditions. GTurbo’s High-Performance Filter solves both issues, offering superior filtration efficiency and maximum airflow, ensuring reliable protection and sustained power even in the toughest environments. Note:This is a dry-style air filter; it does not require oiling and should not be washed or oiled. Available Applications:GTurbo High-Performance Filters are available for the N80 Hilux and VDJ70 LandCruiser platforms, offering direct-fit compatibility and superior protection for each engine setup.

products.title: GTurbo 300 Series Fuel Filter Guard
products.description: Description Ready to take your new Landcruiser 300 series off-road? Ensure your adventures are worry-free with the GTurbo Fuel Filter Guard. Designed for ultimate protection and convenience, this guard is crafted from robust 304 stainless steel to shield your factory fuel filter while allowing easy access for servicing. The fuel filter on the Toyota 300 series is positioned in the back of the of the vehicle near the right-hand rear wheel, a vulnerable spot where rocks and debris can easily cause damage. The GTurbo 300 Series Fuel Filter Guard, made from 3mm stainless steel, offers a sturdy barrier against potential hazards. Its wrap-around design provides comprehensive protection from all angles, preventing damage from stray sticks and stones. Using factory mounting locations, the GTurbo Fuel Filter Guard ensures an OEM-quality installation. The guard features built-in drainage holes for self-draining and easy cleaning, increased rigidity, and a sleek appearance. This ensures that maintenance is seamless, without needing to remove the guard, preserving the ease of servicing for both you and your Toyota technician. Don’t let a damaged fuel filter ruin your off-road experience. Invest in the GTurbo Fuel Filter Guard for reliable protection and peace of mind on every journey.

products.description: Description Introducing the Turbo Product Package for the HZJ70/80/105: Unleash the Full Potential of Your 1HZ Vehicle! If you own a naturally aspirated HZJ70/80/105 and desire a significant boost in power and torque, look no further than this GTurbo Starter Package. Specially designed to turbocharge your 1HZ, this comprehensive kit will take your driving experience to the next level. With the GTurbo Turbo Product Package, you can expect a remarkable increase in power and torque, up to a staggering 110%. Say goodbye to sluggish acceleration and enjoy the exhilarating performance that comes with turbocharged engines. These high-quality components guarantee a reliable and durable connection between the turbocharger and the engine. Full 3″ Turbo Back Manta Exhaust:Enhance both the performance and the sound of your vehicle with the full 3″ turbo back Manta Exhaust. Crafted from mild steel and equipped with a single muffler, this exhaust system optimises exhaust flow, reducing back pressure and unlocking even more power. Manual Boost Controller: Take control of your turbocharger’s boost pressure with the manual boost controller. Fine-tune the boost levels to suit your preferences and driving conditions, ensuring a personalised and responsive driving experience. The GTurbo Turbo Product Package is the ultimate solution for turbocharging your HZJ70/80/105. With its comprehensive set of components, you can transform your vehicle into a powerhouse on the road or off the beaten path. Upgrade your 1HZ driving experience and enjoy the thrilling performance that comes with turbocharged engines.

products.title: Landcruiser Freezebrain VDJ 70 Series (Not the 4cyl) AC Amplifier 88650-60G20 upgraded replacement (FREE POSTAGE)
products.description: Description Landcruiser Freezebrain VDJ 70 Series (Not the 4cyl) AC Amplifier 88650-60G20 upgraded replacement (FREE POSTAGE) – Use Code – FREEZE at Checkout Looking for colder air con on your Cruiser? We’ve made our own plug and play replacement AC Amplifier that lowers your evaporator temperature by 5 degrees. The AC Amplifier is what Toyota call the air con controller and the factory unit limits the evaporator temperature to around 6-7 deg. With the Freezebrain installed your air conditioner will allow you to adjust your AC dial all the way down to 1 degree! The Freezebrain retains all the stock controls and functionality, 100% plug and play. Super easy to install, the hardest bit is finding your 10mm socket. The AC Amp is behind the passenger speaker, unbolt it, unclip the end of the housing, slide out the Toyota controller and slide ours in. We added led’s to help you diagnose air con faults and also added an idle control switch which lets you keep the idle up slightly as if the compressor was on, even when it’s not. This can be really helpful for keeping the alternator charge up at idle. Full installation and operation instructions are in the box. DOES NOT FIT THE 2.8L 70 Series

products.title: PDI Isuzu D-Max 2012-2019 RG / MU-X 2012-2020 PDI Heavy Duty Transmission Cooler
products.description: Description PDI Isuzu D-Max 2012-2019 RG / MU-X 2012-2020 PDI Heavy Duty Transmission Cooler The Isuzu D-Max 2012-2019 RG / MU-X 2012-2020 PDI Heavy Duty Transmission Cooler boasts 48 plates in a 280x280x38mm core this unit is rated at 29,000BTU. This unit exceeds the efficiency rating of other single and dual cooler (run in series) systems on the market with the addition benefit of being stacked plate which also offers less restriction to flow. You may note that others aren’t specifying the unit rating which typically it is untested or they don’t want to make it easy to compare products. By default, all PDI external transmission coolers are design to be market leading through: · Maximum efficiency BTU (energy dissipation unit of measure) stacked plate coolers. These are the premium design cooler, notably better than “Tube and Fin” or “Plate and Fin” setups, known for being more efficient as well as being more expensive. · Steel one-piece brackets (zinc plated and coated) to eliminate flexing of the aluminium cooler. We don’t want stainless brackets that look cool but are brittle and cause corrosion to the steel parts they are bolted to. · High quality transmission cooler hose (rated to 400psi). · Optimised location with transmission cooler mounted in front of the hot side of the intercooler – this is to ensure it doesn’t put heat straight back into the intake air as higher intake temps mean torque is reduced and the transmission can make much more heat if this results in it coming out of lockup. · Outlets on either side or top to prevent air locks inside the transmission cooler. NOTE: Having the outlets at the bottom will make the installation easier as the pipes are run down under the radiator, BUT if you get an airlock (from initial installation empty) there is a strong chance you will never actually fill the top of the coolers with fluid and designed cooler efficiency may never be reached. · Designed to work with either the factory intercooler or a PDI upgraded front mounted intercooler. Suitable Isuzu D-MAX and MU-X 5 Speed A750 and 6 Speed AC60 Automatic Transmission. Works with factory intercooler and PDI intercooler. For details on PDI intercooler Click Here
products.additionalInfo: Additional information Weight 4 kg Dimensions 45 × 39 × 11 cm

products.title: Toyota Prado 150 Series PDI Heavy Duty Transmission Cooler suit 5 speed A750 and 6 speed AC60
products.description: Description Toyota Prado 150 Series PDI Heavy Duty Transmission Cooler suit 5 speed A750 and 6 speed AC60 Specific for the KDJ150 series Prado we have chosen to move the thermo fan to the other side of the engine bay. This adds an extra task to the install, but the position is ideal for the engine power delivery as it sits in front of the intercooler and makes the transmission hose plumbing short and tidy. For GDJ150 Prado, the port on the condenser, makes moving the fan to the passenger side very difficult, due to space limitations and would require the installation of a aftermarket fan. NOTE: A number of other aftermarket systems place their transmission cooler in front of the cold side of the intercooler. We have had a number of retired mechanics realise the effects of this and looking to upgrade their intercooler since the higher intake air temps result in less torque and the transmission come out of lockup, which makes even more heat – they ended up with both intercooler and transmission cooler from PDI. By default, all PDI external transmission coolers are designed to be market leading through: · Maximum efficiency 29,000BTU (energy dissipation unit of measure). – Stacked Plate coolers – this is the best design you can use. · Steel one-piece brackets (zinc plated and coated) to eliminate flexing of the aluminium cooler. · High quality transmission cooler hose (rated to 400psi). · Outlets on the side to prevent air locks inside the transmission cooler. NOTE: Having the outlets at the bottom make the installation easier as the pipes are run down under the radiator, but if you get an airlock (from initial installation empty) there is a strong chance you will never actually fill the top of the coolers with fluid and designed cooler efficiency may never be reached. Suitable for the following engines: 1GD-FTV 2.8L Diesel, 1KD-FTV 3.0L Diesel and 1GR-FE 4.0L Petrol Additional införmation below PLUS: PDI have developed an upgraded front mounted intercooler kit for the 150 Prado that will allow the engine to maintain its higher torque and power output under load. This means your gearbox is more likely to remain locked up while pulling up long hills and therefore significantly reduce transmission temperatures. For more info CLICK HERE
products.additionalInfo: Additional information Weight 4 kg Dimensions 45 × 39 × 11 cm Engine 1KD-FTV (3.0l), 1GD-FTV (2.8l)

NOTE: Having the outlets at the bottom will make the installation easier as the pipes are run down under the radiator, BUT if you get an airlock (from initial installation empty) there is a strong chance you will never actually fill the top of the coolers with fluid and designed cooler efficiency may never be reached. · Designed to work with either the factory intercooler or a PDI upgraded front mounted intercooler. products.title: MM4x4 Torque Converter Lock Up kit Toyota
products.description: Description MM4x4 Torque Converter Lock Up kit Toyota MM4x4 Lockup-Mate lockup-mate®PLUS+ is a torque converter clutch (TCC) lockup kit designed specifically for the Toyota automatic transmission and uses digital communication with the vehicle ECU, making it the most intelligent lockup kit available. ​ Better driveability – save fuel, protect the transmission from heat, and maximum engine braking. ​ Fully automatic – just turn it on and drive! Locks up in DRIVE and SPORT/MANUAL modes from 2nd gear; and adapts for low range (4L) operation automatically. ​ Separate lockup algorithms for DRIVE, SPORT/MANUAL and 4L modes, and fully adjustable for your own vehicle configuration or driving preference. ​ lockup-mate®PLUS+ is the only lockup kit available with SafeLock® Clutch Protection which protects the torque converter clutch from excessive wear to give maximum life expectancy and reliability. Using the information obtained via the digital interface with the vehicle ECUs, it prevents activating the clutch during high slip conditions and only engages when within the same low slip limits the factory ECU uses. Plus, it uses the same PWM control signal and engagement profile as the factory ECU. ​ Our kit fully supports the flex-lockup mode of the transmission for maximum fuel savings. Using advanced microcomputer control and digital CANBus communications with the vehicle’s computers, it works in harmony with the factory computers for maximum smoothness. ECU code deletes are not necessary to avoid Check Engine Lights, and the ECU doesn’t need to be removed to be reprogrammed. lockup-mate®PLUS+ is not only for people who tow. The driveability and feel of the car is enhanced with more direct power and responsiveness. Without doubt, lockup-mate®PLUS is the most advanced and easy to use lockup kit available for your Toyota.

products.title: Ford Ranger “Next Gen” PDI Extreme Transmission cooler kit
products.description: Description Ford Ranger “Next Gen” PDI Extreme Transmission cooler kit Designs have been completed – these kits once again are designed to outclass the competition with design and efficiency. When compared to other “heavy duty” options, it is only appropriate for these to be called Extreme, due to much higher efficiency and stronger mounting with a steel bracket that is hard mounted to the panel (instead of the plastic frame. In addition to our other class leading features (standard in all PDI transmission cooler kits), the 6 speed and 10 speed auto gearbox fitted to the Ranger MUST be fitted with 1/2inch ( 12mm lines). Do not attempt to adapt smaller lines to work with the transmission as these transmissions require high fluid flow to prevent long term issues. NOTE: other Australian supplied transmission coolers kits for the Ford Ranger use 4.5-5.0m of 10mm hose to get from the gearbox to front of the car. They also released them with restrictive, smaller coolers (16,000BTU rated) and when it was realised that their cooling was insufficient for many installs, a second cooler was added IN SERIES, which makes their heat capability close to our unit but too restrictive By default, all PDI external transmission coolers are designed to be market leading through: · Maximum efficiency 45,000BTU (energy dissipation unit of measure). – Stacked Plate coolers – this is the best design you can use. · Steel one-piece brackets (zinc plated and coated) to eliminate flexing of the aluminium cooler. · High quality transmission cooler hose (rated to 400psi). · Outlets on the top to prevent air locks inside the transmission cooler. NOTE: Having the outlets at the bottom make the installation easier as the pipes are run down under the radiator, but if you get an airlock (from initial installation empty) there is a strong chance you will never actually fill the top of the coolers with fluid and designed cooler efficiency may never be reached. This is the best cooler we have ever seen and does an exceptional job at dropping transmission temperatures. A number of years ago, a friend needed massive cooling for his offroad race vehicle, which was auto and running a high powered 4.2L turbo diesel engine – in my 1 ride in this vehicle out the back of “the pines”, as well as being very fast in and out of the corners, I just thought how hard he was on the transmission. He asked for a large (550x300x76mm) bar and plate intercooler, which he sealed the outlets and ran transmission fluid through it. After a few races he decided he needed more cooling so we supplied the 45,000BTU transmission cooler above, which he claimed made a big difference. A couple years later, he reported that at some point, due to mounting and the weight of the fluid filled intercooler it formed a crack, so he had to bypass it during a race and it made no difference to the overall cooling as the properly designed and suitably sized stacked plate core did such a good job. At that point the much larger bar and plate cooler was never refitted. · Once our upgraded intercooler kit is released, it will be with the same larger transmission cooler to work with either the factory intercooler or a PDI upgraded front mounted intercooler. For more information CLICK HERE Suitable Ford Ranger 6 Speed 6R80 and Ford Ranger PX 10 Speed 10R80/10R70 Automatic Transmissions. Also available for the engine variants 2L single turbo, 2L bi-turbo, 3L V6 turbo diesel and Raptor 3L V6 twin turbo petrol.
products.additionalInfo: Additional information Weight 7.5 kg Dimensions 115 × 12 × 37 cm

products.title: Toyota Landcruiser 1VD-FTV  GTurbo Power-Pipe
products.description: Description Toyota Landcruiser 1VD-FTV GTurbo Power-Pipe High-Flow Intake Pipe | 4″ to 3″ Stainless Steel | Direct Replacement The GTurbo Power Pipe is a high-performance replacement for the factory air intake pipe on the VDJ70 Series Land Cruiser, designed to improve airflow and long-term reliability. Crafted from 316-grade stainless steel and purge TIG-welded, the GTurbo Power Pipe is built for strength, durability, and clean airflow. The purge welding process ensures the inside of the pipe is smooth and free from dags, weld spatter, or debris that could compromise your engine. It is 4″ in diameter from the airbox, tapering to 3″ at the turbo inlet. A custom-engineered engine mount is included to relocate the mount, eliminating the clearance issues that force the factory intake to squash down to just 2”. The result is a high-flow, performance-focused intake that holds its shape under pressure, heat, and load. Why Upgrade? The factory intake pipe is mostly plastic and known to fail, especially over time. As it absorbs oil from the engine breather, it softens, then splits or collapses under load, a failure we’ve seen firsthand on the dyno. This can cause dust and debris to enter the turbo, reduce performance, and in extreme cases, lead to turbocharger or engine damage. The GTurbo Power Pipe offers: Significantly increased airflow, unlocking more power with tuning and supporting mods Reduced restriction, allowing the turbo and engine to work less for more airflow Superior reliability, with stainless construction that won’t soften, crack, or collapse Improved turbo efficiency, resulting in better throttle response, lower EGTs, and smoother power delivery Whether you’re chasing more power, better efficiency, or long-term reliability, the GTurbo Power Pipe is a critical upgrade for your VDJ build.
products.additionalInfo: Additional information Weight 10 kg Dimensions 70 × 40 × 25 cm

products.title: MM4x4 Torque Converter Lock Up kit Isuzu / Mazda
products.description: Description MM4x4 Torque Converter Lock Up kit Isuzu / Mazda ISUZU (4JJ1/4JJ3)​ D-MAX 3.0L 6SP 2016+ M-UX 3.0L 6SP 2016+ ​​ MAZDA (4JJ3) BT-50 3.0L 2020+* * NOT COMPATIBLE WITH FORD RANGER VERSION Better driveability, maximum engine braking , less flaring, reduces transmission heat and saves fuel Fully automatic – just turn it on and drive! Locks up in DRIVE and MANUAL modes from 3rd gear (35 KPH); and deactivates for low range (4L) operation automatically. Transmission protection – advanced digital control Separate lockup algorithms for DRIVE and MANUAL Fully plug’n play installation and easy to install No reprogramming of the factory ECU is required Dedicated lockup indicator LED is easily visible to the driver, and no factory switch slot is needed. IMPORTANT: If you are using, or plan to use, an OBD2 Reader, eg ScanGauge? CLICK HERE​ lockup-mate®MX is a premium torque converter clutch (TCC) lockup kit designed specifically for the Isuzu D-MAX/ MU-X and Mazda BT50. It uses digital communication with the vehicle ECUs via the CANBus making it the most intelligent lockup kit available. Key Features… Fully plug’n play installation – simple DIY installation and is easily removable without trace Advanced Digital Control – for fully automatic lockup control, protection, and advanced features CANBus interface to ECUs – to determine key operational data like speed, gear, load, RPM, mode (Drive, Manual, 4L) etc. Separate lockup strategies for DRIVE and MANUAL Lockup in high range (35 KPH+) in 3rd–6th gears – no manual button lockup nor in 2nd and 4L to avoid transmission LIMP modes and potential damage Lockup when coasting – for maximum engine braking and direct drive responsiveness Load sensitive – for transmission protection and improved drivability SafeLock® – for driveline and clutch protection Factory-like PWM solenoid control – for maximum performance and to avoid a burnt out solenoid! LED/Switch: – Lockup Status is easily visible to assist the driver with maximising benefits– Also a momentary switch to toggle the kit on and off– Slip Alert – advising driver when to downshift to regain full lockup (when in MANUAL mode)– Auto-Dim – linked to the headlight being ON, with manual override for daytime headlight use – Warmup – kit automatically deactivates while waiting for the transmission to warmup and pulses the LED to let the driver know Self-Test Diagnostics Mode – to confirm operation after installation Engine Light (CEL) reset feature – to self-recover from an installation related error code OBD2 interface – to allow lockup kit and extra vehicle parameters to be displayed on your OBD2 gauge Transmission Protection…​ lockup-mate®MX is the only lockup kit available that properly integrates with the Isuzu transmission to prevent potential damage.​ ​​ Safelock® Clutch Protection​ SafeLock® protects the torque converter clutch from excessive wear to give maximum life expectancy and reliability. Using the information obtained via the digital interface with the vehicle ECUs, it prevents activating the clutch during high slip conditions and only engages when within the same low slip limits the factory ECU uses. SafeLock® also ensures smooth transmission operation with no clunks or shift shock. Emergency Brake unlock feature hands control of the solenoid back to the factory computer ensures there is no interference with vehicle safety systems like Stability Control, Traction Control and ABS. ​ ​Pulse Width Modulation (PWM) solenoid control The electrical control of the solenoid uses the same PWM signal and engagement profile as the factory ECU to prevent damage to the solenoid (burnout). ​ Load Sensitivity The Isuzu is the only transmission we’ve found which will lose full lockup under load and slip the clutch. Load sensitivity is a critical feature of our kit to prevent clutch wear. With the Isuzu, a simple speed (KPH) based ON/OFF design risks clutch slip, even at 80-90 KPH. Lockup-mate®MX will automatically unlock under certain load conditions to protect the transmission from damage. No Error Codes When Isuzu transmission throws an error code the result is a very nasty clunk. lockup-mate®MX stays within the transmission’s acceptable performance limits to avoid error codes, so it will lockup in high range 3rd-6th gears, and will avoid lockup in 2nd and 4L and when full lockup is unsuitable for this vehicle. Advanced Digital ControlUsing advanced microcomputer control and digital CANBus communications with the vehicle’s computers, it works in harmony with the factory computers for maximum smoothness, to avoid error codes and prevent damage to the transmission. Flex-lockup mode of the transmission is still supported for maximum fuel savings. OBD2 Gauge PIDs lockup-mate®MX is like any other ECU on the CANBus so we’ve included the ability for your aftermarket OBD2 Gauge (eg UltraGaugeMX, ScanGauge 2/3, Car Scanner App) to read vehicle information from the lockup-mate®MX computer. Information available to display is lockup status, transmission temperature, load/pedal % (even with cruise control on), steering wheel angle, and actual gear. For 4JJ1 models it also includes the engine coolant temperature.
products.additionalInfo: Additional information Weight 1 kg Dimensions 27 × 22 × 16 cm Vehicle Model Isuzu D-MAX 3.0L Diesel 2020+, Isuzu M-UX 3.0L Diesel 2021+, Mazda BT50 3.0L Diesel 2020+, Isuzu D-MAX 3.0L Diesel 2016-2020, Isuzu M-UX 3.0L Diesel 2016-2021

Unfortunately the auto transmission doesn’t seem to be up to the task for power upgrades and can really feel it when hitting the beach. We were asked to design a transmission cooler for these truck and managed to fit a 45,000BTU rated core up under the front. These are premium stacked plate design cores and with our single piece zinc plated mild steel bracket they are well suited to the Isuzu. Once the bash plate is removed the installation is a straight forward process and it can be installed within minutes. Connection into the existing transmission cooler lines is straight forward as the lines are already there. No extra wiring or complications are required. We have not been able to confirm if this is a one off or if some were delivered from Isuzu like this. products.title: Autometer Boost / EGT / Water Temp Combo kit
products.description: Description Autometer Boost / EGT / Water Temp Combo kit AutoMeter Boost / EGT / Water Temperature Combo Kit Stay ahead of critical engine metrics with the AutoMeter Boost, EGT, and Water Temperature Combo Kit—an all-in-one solution for performance monitoring. Designed for high-performance builds and tuned vehicles, this kit ensures you maintain optimal engine health while pushing limits. With precise instrumentation and race-proven reliability, it’s ideal for both street and race applications. Key Features: 35psi Boost Gauge: Measures boost pressure with ultra-precise bourdon tube movement. No electrical system required—simple 1/8” NPT connection for seamless installation. Clear blue LED through-the-dial lighting for superior nighttime visibility. Exhaust Gas Temperature (EGT) Gauge: Monitors exhaust temps to prevent engine damage in high-output or turbocharged setups. Equipped with a fast-response Type K thermocouple for accurate and rapid readings. High-definition LED display ensures easy readability under all conditions. Water Temperature Gauge: Tracks engine cooling performance to prevent overheating. Includes 1/8” NPT temperature sender, with 3/8” and 1/2” NPT adapters for universal fit. Designed with quick-response air-core electric movement for precision and durability. Why Choose This Kit? Whether you’re chasing horsepower or ensuring engine longevity on daily drives, this combo kit provides all the essential data to keep your engine running at its peak. Maintain proper boost levels, monitor EGT to avoid heat-related damage, and track coolant temperatures to stay in the safe zone—all with one reliable package. Includes: Boost gauge with mounting hardware and nylon line kit. EGT gauge with Type K thermocouple and harness. Water temperature gauge with sender, adapters, and instructions. Ensure optimal engine performance and protect your investment with the AutoMeter Boost / EGT / Water Temperature Combo Kit—your ultimate performance-monitoring solution.

products.title: GTurbo Airbox 100/105 SERIES
products.description: Description GTurbo Airbox 100/105 SERIES Introducing GTurbo’s new range of high-performance airboxes, specifically designed to meet the rigorous standards GTurbo demands for its turbocharger systems. After an exhaustive search for an airbox that could match the performance and durability needed, GTurbo has crafted its own airbox range to deliver peak performance and reliability. Features: Direct OEM Replacement: Designed as a drop-in replacement for the factory airbox, mounting easily to existing factory locations for a quick, hassle-free installation. Quality Craftsmanship: Professionally TIG-welded for enhanced durability and reliability, meeting GTurbo’s standards for endurance. Premium Materials: CNC cut and folded, with an anodized finish to resist wear over time, unlike traditional powder coating. OEM Filter Compatibility: Maintains ease of maintenance by using the standard OEM air filter. (VDJ200 Filter) Stainless Hardware: Includes all stainless-steel hardware, ensuring superior corrosion resistance and lasting quality. Double Seal: All GTurbo airboxes are equipped with our unique double-seal system around the lid, providing unmatched dust prevention and keeping your intake system clean in even the toughest environments. The GTurbo airbox range is designed to provide unparalleled air intake performance, enabling you to get the most out of your GTurbo-equipped vehicle. For those who demand excellence, GTurbo’s high-flow airbox range is the solution you’ve been waiting for. *Please note that this does not come with silicon joiners for the snorkel connection

products.title: PDI Ford Ranger Front Mount Intercooler 3.2L 2012-2022
products.description: Description PDI Ford Ranger Front Mount Intercooler 3.2L 2012-2022 The latest update to the PDI intercoolers for the Ford Ranger makes easier fit with the updated PX3 facelift model through to the last of 3.2L (2022) model. The facelift model also saw a change to the radiator support panel, which allows us to fit the core further back without dropping the height (more than 20mm) and therefore allow the addition of the transmission cooler kit – see below if you have a PX1 as we think it should also fit there with some tweaks. The new core is 680 x 260 x 76 with slighter tighter end tank setup. This new design works with our class leading PDI transmission cooler kits, which need to be a serious consideration for any owners of the auto transmission model. For information on our transmission cooler kit CLICK HERE. Fully cast end tanks ensures they are the strongest possible and least likely to split along a seam. We have had the air temperature sensor cast into the end tank as well as a oil drain. All piping is stainless steel and the turbo side piping is rerouted to be significantly shorter and with a single 63mm pipe. Core is positioned further back at the bottom to allow the fitment of a winch. The first of the PDI Ford Ranger Front Mount Intercooler designs core is 700x300x76mm and has bigger and high flow cast alloy end tanks. These are still available. If you want to increase the size of the entry into the turbo check out our product HERE
products.additionalInfo: Additional information Weight 19 kg Dimensions 92 × 28 × 44 cm Model / Core Type PX1 – 300 Tall with 3" outlets, PX2 onwards – 260mm Tall with 2.5" outlets (suitable for PDI Transmission Cooler)

products.title: Prado 120 Front Mounted intercooler kit
products.description: Description Prado 120 Front Mounted intercooler kit The best intercooler for the Prado 120 series for anyone wanting the best out of their engine, for either towing or performance upgrades. It was always going to be a difficult one due to limited space on the drivers side for piping from the front. After a few revisions this allowed us to get the maximum intercooler size and the placement is as high as we could get it. Placement is very important to maximise cooling, reduce potential for damage and to allow them to be fitted with winches. Inlet temps have dropped significantly and the owner reporting that “its like driving it on a cold day all the time now” with inlet air temps 4-6deg above ambient. The next generation of Prado (150 series) is factory fitted with a front mounted intercooler for the purpose of increase efficiency so this can now be experienced with the PDI intercooler in the 120 series Prado. Core is 600x265x76mm and is placed as high as possible for maximum exposure to cool air. We have utilised 63mm stainless piping where possible.
products.additionalInfo: Additional information Weight 22 kg Dimensions 93 × 40 × 24 cm Engine 1KZ, 1KD

Benefits: This smaller core reduces EGTs with minimal heat impact on the radiator and A/C condenser—especially beneficial for the 1HZ engine design. Note: For a larger core on the 1HZ, choose the 1HDT kit. products.title: Hilux N70 KUN26 D4D Front Mount Intercooler Kit Mk 2
products.description: Description Hilux N70 KUN26 D4D Front Mount Intercooler Kit Mk 2 The PDI Mk2 Hilux front mount fits like a glove with: 600x300x76mm core (around 20% larger than competitors designs) custom high flow end tanks. 3” outlets into the engine bay. 2.5” stainless piping, thick 5 ply silicon and high torque Breeze liner clamps. After fitting to a couple of high powered Hilux’s, which already had a front mount intercooler, we have seen an increase in power delivery across the range as this larger core has allowed an even more aggressive tune. Sits neatly at the front. Uses zinc coated (and painted) mild steel brackets and a vertical support behind the intercooler to the lower crossmember to secure the bonnet latch. We don’t use stainless as it will cause the area around to start rusting due to cathodic reaction. Following upgrading to the larger Mk2 kit (from a 500mm wide core) it has been reported that the engine is more responsive across the whole rpm range. This is the largest core you can fit (possible due to our custom end tanks) and still retain the factory grill and any bumper/bullbar option. Additionally the tapering in of the headlight/grill line is matched by the end tanks to complement the design of the front of the vehicle. We have supplied intercoolers to highly modified 4WD where the owner is pushing the engine limits and running upwards of 60psi. Our cores have proved to be able to deal with the abuse an addition to amazing the customers with inlet air being so close to ambient both on the dyno and during use on the road/track/strip. Please see the cross-section picture of the core showing the mounting to help decide if this will fit with your winch.
products.additionalInfo: Additional information Weight 18 kg Dimensions 95 × 52 × 30 cm

products.title: PDI Isuzu D-MAX MU-X RG Front mount Intercooler Kit 3LT 2012-2016 / 2017-2020
products.description: Description PDI Isuzu D-MAX MU-X RG Front mount Intercooler Kit 3LT 2012-2016 / 2017-2020 We are sure the PDI Isuzu D-MAX Front mount Intercooler kit is biggest intercooler you could fit up front with full cast alloy end tanks and 63mm outlets. We have optimised the width of the core for maximum cooling and also to ensure we do not limit the flow through the condenser and radiator by blocking flow with the end tanks. Core is 680x280x76mm and sits on original factory mounts. 2.5” (63mm) mandrel bent stainless pipes for optimum flow. We choose stainless due to its extreme resistance to rubbing through. The factory setup has upper and lower flexible pipes on both sides to get down to the intercooler outlets. These have been replaced with one stainless pipe on each side and 5-ply flexible silicon. The inlet air pressure sensor is mounted into the fitting on the inlet manifold pipe. Clamps are all the highest torque rated Breeze units you can buy. The PDI ISUZU D-MAX Front mount Intercooler kit is winch compatible as it sits behind the factory centre support bracket. If you also wish to upgrade the transmission cooler we are developing a kit utilising a highly efficient cooler, with single piece zinc plated steel mounting bracket and positioned on the drivers side to prevent heat being place back into the air on the cold side of the intercooler. This will be better for intake temps when the transmission torque converter is working hard. Additionally the oil lines will be on the side (not the bottom) to prevent air locks within the transmission cooler. For details on PDI Transmission Cooler Kit Click here The PDI ISUZU D-MAX Front mount Intercooler upgrade will drop the inlet air temperature more than any other option on the market. The fitment is also the neatest and most durable setup. The core has mounting tabs cast into the end tanks and then precision machined. This allows them to utilise the factory rubbers and bolts for that factory fitment. This will not disappoint. In conjunction with turbo, injectors and module we have seen the DMAX double the power and torque making the PDI ISUZU D-MAX Front mount Intercooler Kit a very interesting proposition.
products.additionalInfo: Additional information Weight 20 kg Dimensions 95 × 32 × 44 cm

products.title: PDI Nissan Patrol Series 4 GU ZD30 CRD (& DI) TD42 Front Mount intercooler Kit
products.description: Description PDI Nissan Patrol Series 4 GU ZD30 CRD (& DI) TD42 Front Mount intercooler Kit PDI developed their new generation intercooler kit for the GU Patrol with an updated core design to give better clearance around the bullbar mounts and sat back further. It was also much bigger – around 40% larger frontal cross-sectional area than a “standard” 600x300mm core. The extra large core is 675 x 370 x 76 and is ideal for those needing the best intercooling for maximum efficiency gains. A smaller intercooler is ample for many customers who need a step above a top mount intercooler, so raised the bottom of the core 110mm (core dimensions 675 x 260 x 76). This design gives additional clearance to all bullbar and winch installs. Both of the above designs use the same intercooler outlet locations, but different piping for the TD42 or ZD30 CRD. The ZD30 has always been highly strung from the factory with rich air fuel ratios and relatively low boost they exhibit very high EGT – only turbo I’ve seen glowing red on the dyno. Once pushed a little harder the top mount design isn’t effective. Replacement top mounted designs aren’t a lot better and we’ve heard of lots of extra constant induction noise with the top mount intercooler. Our front mount is the solution to this as the drop in inlet air temperatures is significant resulting in much lower EGT and improved performance and noticeable economy improvements. The ZD30 kit features 2 1/2″ stainless pipework to and from the intercooler with the stainless necking down to 2” to roll over 180deg and line up with the turbo outlet. This means no elbows coming off the turbo getting blasted with a constant flow of hot air. Our silicon joiner here now has an oil resistant coating. Piping on turbo side briefly goes through the wheel arch but is in stainless so is very unlikely to get damaged. The inlet side piping is also 2.5” stainless and has a joiner in the middle. Two ports are located on the pipe before intake for connection to the MAP sensor and a spare outlet. The TD42 has long been a favourite and with the appropriate mods, can be a solid performer. Our front mounted intercooler will maintain cold day driving performance. We also run through the very front of the passenger side wheel arch area and into the engine bay. Connection to the turbo can be fun as there are many different turbo setups and orientations people run. We can supply an adapter to bold to the factory turbo outlet. The intake side has three parts with the top one being an intake adapter that bolts to the manifold. This adapter has a 1/8”NPT port with brass barb for a boost source. Patrol Series 1 from 1997 to April 2000 – please select alternate kit Patrol Series 2 from April 2000 to October 2001 – please select alternate kit Patrol Series 3 from October 2001 to October 2004 – please select alternate kit Patrol Series 4 from October 2004 to 2016 – PDI kit suitable for all Nissan diesel engines. Auto Transmission Cooler Options If you have an auto then by selection the auto option we will supply the standard kit with one for he best transmission coolers on the market (rated at 45,000BTU) and brackets that bolt to the intercooler with a series of holes that allow it to be located at three different heights. The lowest height places it down so only partially covering the bottom of the intercooler. If you choose to use the original (factory) transmission cooler then you will need to fabricate some brackets and we recommend placing it on the passenger side in front of the hot side of the intercooler. This means the intercooler still has a really good chance to cool the intake air from air heat extracted from the transmission. Thermo fan mounting Following from above for auto with factory transmission cooler or if running a manual gearbox, this gives room to place the thermo fan on the drivers side which means any air pushed through may add to intercooler efficiency, but it means that the cooler side of the intercooler will allow cooler air to pass through and help with air conditioner consdenser function. Our intercooler has 2 lugs on the top and 2 lugs on the bottom to Thermo fan mounting easier. If running aftermarket thermofans we highly recommend SPAL fans from Italy.
products.additionalInfo: Additional information Weight 21 kg Dimensions 105 × 28 × 42 cm Transmission Auto, Manual Intercooler Core Size Extra Large Core 675 x 370 x 76, Large Core 675 x 260 x 76 Engine TD42, ZD30 ZD30 Type N/A, ZD30 DI, ZD30 CRD

products.title: GQ Nissan Patrol TD42 PDI Front Mounted Intercooler Kit
products.description: Description GQ Nissan Patrol TD42 PDI Front Mounted Intercooler Kit At PDI we recognise the GQ has a great following in the 4WD market due to them being a solid drivetrain and lots of modifications to make them a serious contender in the offroad scene. The GQ Nissan Patrol TD42 PDI Front Mounted Intercooler kit benefits from extensive development on other models and demonstrates PDIs focus on produce the biggest and most efficient designs for each vehicle they develop. Suitable for both high and low mounted turbos. The standard hot side piping has a 90deg silicon rescuer to go onto the turbo in the low mount configuration. If you have a high mounted turbo then we have seen people slightly adjust the stainless and change the orientation of the silicon to connect to the intercooler. The GQ Nissan Patrol TD42 PDI Front Mounted Intercooler Kit has 595 x 330 x 76 mm intercooler core Works with the factory air conditioning system in place. Fully cast alloy end tanks with recesses to allow it to sit back and maintain the factory look. Stainless pipe (polished) 2.5” Adapter to bolt onto the intake manifold. Black silicon 6mm thick with 5 layers for maximum longevity. USA made high torque liner clamps. Mild steel brackets – zinc plated and then painted black – no stainless brackets which are prone to fatigue crack and cause rusting of body panels due to anode/cathode reaction. Screw in oil drain on bottom of intercooler. The end result is an intercooler that will reduce intake temps to a minimum to maintain the performance only normally seen on cold days when driving unloaded. The increase in Mass air density will also allow more fuel to be added safely without risking excessive EGT. We would expect your EGT to drop 50-100deg.

products.title: GTurbo VDJ70/200 Gen 2 Intercooler Fan Kit
products.description: Description GTurbo Gen 2 Fan Kit – Toyota LandCruiser VDJ70 & VDJ200 Upgrade your LandCruiser’s factory intercooler system with GTurbo’s next-generation Gen 2 Intercooler Fan Kit. Purpose-built for the facelift VDJ70 (including non-scoop bonnet models) and all VDJ200 (2007–2021), this bolt-on kit delivers a huge leap in efficiency, reliability, and ease of installation. Why Upgrade? Your intercooler is critical for controlling intake air temperatures. By cooling compressed air from the turbocharger, it improves air density, combustion, throttle response, and fuel efficiency, while protecting your engine from high intake temps. With the Gen 2 Fan Kit, you get constant airflow across the core, reducing heat soak and ensuring your V8 performs at its best, even at low vehicle speeds or under heavy load. Key Features & Benefits Over 2× More Effective CoolingCompared to the original GTurbo kit, the Gen 2 brings intercooler temps back to ambient more than twice as fast after hard pulls. Custom Fan & ShroudOptimised shroud design ensures even airflow distribution for maximum cooling. Hydraulic-Pressed Aluminium Anodised PlateLightweight yet rigid, the anodised plate ensures even airflow distribution, long-term durability, and corrosion resistance. GTurbo Control ModuleAn all-in-one controller with integrated temperature sensors, fuses, relays, and power management, simplifying wiring and boosting reliability. Rapid 15-Minute InstallUses OEM mounting points and a plug-and-play harness, making it workshop-friendly and easy to service. Vehicle Compatibility Toyota LandCruiser VDJ70 (2007–2025, including facelift models) Toyota LandCruiser VDJ200 (2007–2021)
products.additionalInfo: Additional information Weight 8 kg Dimensions 80 × 18 × 44 cm

products.title: PDI Landcruiser HDJ100 / 100 / 105 Series Front Mount Intercooler Mk2 1HD series core
products.description: Description PDI Landcruiser HDJ100 / 100 / 105 Series Front Mount Intercooler Mk2 1HD series core Core size: 675x300x76. Thats over 5.8 x greater surface area than the HDJ100 factory core, is thicker and better placed for increased cooling. Fits with all bull-bar and winch designs as the core sits back close to the condenser. Will fit a 100 series HDj100 with no modifications to the air conditioning system. If you have a 105 and would like to fit the large core, then the hose and piping from the condenser to the compressor needs to be replaced with the recessed HDJ100 pipe, or purchase a one piece replacement from us. Intercooler pipes: 2.5” stainless steel with heavy duty silicon joiners. Silicon selection now simplified with no silicon in front of the front panel. High torque stainless steel clamps. The moulded end tanks with rear facing outlets have enabled a bigger core, then we pushed it back as far as possible to increase the draw through from the engine cooling fan. With the outlets being rear facing, the stainless steel pipes are connected to the intercooler with straight silicon. During testing we have seen this maintain intake temps to 4-7degC above ambient temperature for normal around town driving. When under load (on the highway towing a heavy trailer) running a steady 15-18psi with 150degC the intake temps sat 15deg above ambient. On a 20degC the intake temps got up to 35deg – you’ll have to trust us, but that’s really impressive. For HZJ105 running the 1HZ engine we suggest our smaller core (645x240x65) to reduce the heat loading on the radiator. While it is not as effective as our larger core, most 1HZ aren’t pushed too hard and this core will easily cater for almost all turbo 1HZ builds. This core is designed to fit around the condenser pipe. Air can be felt strongly pulling through the intercooler 50-80mm in front of the core, while idling on startup. To continue to have the air being pulled through while engine temps are low (and the fan hub normally free wheels) some extra fluid can be added to the viscous coupling. The early 100 series didn’t have any power steering cooler pipes out front and most owners leave it like that. If you have or want to maintain the power steering pipe cooler this need to be routed through the opening for the passenger side headlight. A crossover delete option is available (extra $150) for the 1HD-FTE. All 1HZ / 1HD-T / 1HD-FT are crossover delete design as standard and has no extra fee. CROSSOVER DELETE OPTION For the 1HDFTE, PDI give the option of leaving the crossover in place (with the EGR valve) or a cast alloy adapter onto the inlet manifold for all of the cruiser models (80/75/79100/105). If you would like the crossover delete please CLICK HERE and add to you cart. The 1HDFTE in our HDJ79 ute has the crossover in place and has 311rwkw and 1000nm (at the wheels). I’m sure there is a point where air flow is better without the crossover but I don’t believe we are there yet. Leaving the crossover in place is good for: 1. Legally it has to be there since the EGR valve is in the crossover – you can still stop EGR gas flow with the valve in place. 2. No more power is made by removing the crossover (for most people) 3. Smooth shutdown is possible with the crossover and butterfly in place. 4. If the engine ever runs on its own fumes (and I’ve seen two FTEs do that) then turning off the key turns off the engine. 5. If it’s the late model with electronic butterfly then it must remain plugged in to the harness. 6. If you need to pass a pit inspection the crossover must be fitted. AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION COOLER The transmission coolers available to fit with our kits are the best we could find and we give the option of two versions for the 100/105 series. The standard one is the same as is used in the 80 series kits and we get reports that transmission temps have dropped after fitting our intercooler and trans cooler. As well as the trans cooler being very good we also expect the transmission can hold the gear for longer and stay in lock-up, which reduces heat being made. From the pictures you can see we have chosen to have them in front of the intercooler. The auto cooler bracket has six options with three different positions for either of the two transmission coolers. We recommend having them in the lower position to prevent heat transfer into the intercooler but if other items such as winches are fitted it would be good idea to have the transmission cooler lifted up for better cooling. HD Transcooler Option. PLATES DESIGN DIMENSIONS HEAT DISSIPATION RATING 13 plate Stacked Plate 560mm x 215mm x 32mm 45,000BTU This is the best cooler we have ever seen and does an exceptional job at dropping transmission temperatures. A number of years ago, a friend needed massive cooling for his offroad race vehicle, which was auto and running a high powered FTE engine – in my 1 ride in this vehicle out the back of “the pines”, as well as being fast in and out of the corners, I just thought how hard he was on the transmission. He asked for a large (550x300x76mm) bar and plate intercooler, which he sealed the outlets and ran transmission fluid through it. After a few races he decided he needed more cooling so we supplied the 45,000BTU transmission cooler above, which he claimed made a big difference. A couple years later, he reported that at some point, due to mounting and the weight of the fluid filled intercooler it formed a crack, so he had to bypass it during a race and it made no difference to the overall cooling as the properly designed and suitably sized stacked plate core did such a good job. At that point the much larger bar and plate cooler was never refitted. The ideal operating temperature for automatic transmission fluid is somewhere between 80 and 110 degrees C. Here’s what can happen above this range: At approximately 115 degrees C, important additives begin to cook in the automatic transmission fluid (ATF). The result is the formation of varnish inside the transmission. At approximately 125 degrees C, internal transmission seals, which are often manufactured from a polyacrylate material, begin to harden. The end results are internal and external leaks as the the seals lose their elasticity. At approximately 145 degrees C, transmission clutch plates begin to slip because the oil is breaking down further. At approximately 160 degrees C, seals and clutches effectively burn out. Carbon forms in the oil and your effectively killed the transmission. Often, a transmission will die within a few thousand km after experiencing 150-plus degree heat. It is worth noting that the AT temp warning light on a 4 speed auto Landcruiser came on at 150degC and that generally means you are well beyond a safe temperature.

products.title: PDI Landcruiser HDJ79 Front Mount Intercooler Kit HDJ78 / HDJ79 / HZJ79
products.description: Description PDI Landcruiser HDJ79 Front Mount Intercooler Kit HDJ78 / HDJ79 / HZJ79 The PDI Landcruiser HDJ79 Front Mount intercooler kit is the neatest and most effective intercooler kits to suit your 73, 75, 77, 78 or 79 series narrow nose cruiser. If you have a 75 series you can choose our other product (75 Series kits) The PDI Landcruiser HDJ79 Front Mount intercooler kit for the 6 cylinder narrow nose 70 series sits directly behind the factory grill for maximum cooling potential and will not interfere with other installed items such as lights or a winch. This is possible with the relocation of air conditioner piping and the drier to the engine bay. All parts required to mount the intercooler and relocate the intercooler are included in the kit. This includes three flexible hoses and the drier for moving the air conditioner piping from behind the grill. Long term testing has shown this to be highly effective for the inlet air temperatures and for the function of the air conditioner itself with no impact on the radiators ability to keep the engine cool. The cores are 600mm x 240mm, which fills the space available at the front. Our front mount kit cooling capability is greater than all other kits we have tested so the improvements in torque and power will exceed other results. PDI kits use moulded end tanks to get maximum width. We limit the height to the grill opening and stay away from extending the core down to sit both behind the front panel and/or in front of the horizontal crossmember, which means cooling flow isn’t restricted. Other kits, which don’t get the same unrestricted flow, would expect to see dilution of the chilled air with air that hasn’t been able to be effectively cooled therefore becoming less efficient. Customers and tuners are amazed how well our PDI systems work. Being neat, as per factory finish, adds to the appeal. Once fitted are a zero maintenance setup, and still allow access into the engine bay for any maintenance or inspection. For those with factory turbo engines (1HDFTE standard or converted to 1HDT or 1HDFT) we have 76mm cores. Black cores are available, black piping is not standard. CROSSOVER DELETE OPTION For the 1HDFTE, PDI give the option of leaving the crossover in place (with the EGR valve) or a forward facing cast alloy adapter onto the inlet manifold for all of the cruiser models (80 / 75 / 79 / 100 / 105). The PDI adapter has mounting for 2 pressure ports, intake air temp sensor plus a mounting for MAP sensor and MAP sensor filter – the later 2 are to enable correct draining and to keep these items on the engine for wiring longevity. The 1HDFTE in our HDJ79 ute has the standard crossover in place and has 311rwkw and 1000nm (at the wheels). Maybe once rear wheel power exceeds 450hp, the crossover will become a restriction, but the FTE injection pump doesn’t have enough fuel for that. Leaving the crossover in place is good for: 1. Legally it has to be there since the EGR valve is in the crossover – you can still stop EGR gas flow with the valve in place. 2. No more power is made by removing the crossover (for most people) 3. Smooth shutdown is possible with the crossover and butterfly in place. 4. If the engine ever runs on its own fumes (and I’ve seen two FTEs do that) then turning off the key turns off the engine. 5. If it’s the late model with electronic butterfly then it must remain plugged in to the harness. 6. If you need to pass a pit inspection the crossover must be fitted. We would suggest only removing the crossover if it aesthetically bothers you. Our test HDJ79 cruiser fitted with the PDI Landcruiser HDJ79 Front Mount intercooler kit is putting down 300rwkw on heavy mud tyres that suck an additional 15rwkw. This allows us to get some high load testing done and also be assured that not many are going to push it harder than we do – hopefully by then we will be pushing it harder too. The power output for the 1HDFTE in the ute and troopy was set to be 122kW (at the engine), down from 151kW in the 100 series with the factory fitted intercooler. This normally equates to 90rwkw and 110rwkw, respectively, after drivetrain power loss. Our first released PDI Landcruiser HDJ79 Front Mount intercooler kit had a 600x240x65mm core and now we have managed to fit a 76mm thick core behind the factory grill (with a bit of slimming to the plastic), which for many who have considered the custom install to be impossible. The pipework is also 2 1/2” stainless steel for improved flow and durability. Note stock levels of the 76mm core have been depleted and we have 65mm cores Initial testing of the system was with an upgraded Gturbo Badboy turbo, tuning module, Safari ARMax snorkel and running standard injectors and standard airbox. Dyno testing with this configuration has resulted in a max power of 186.4kW at the wheels with a low 20psi boost. We also managed to achieve 18psi at 1550rpm with maximum torque of 668Nm at (only) 1850rpm. There is no doubt this is has to be one of the best combinations for a “mildly modified” 1HDFTE that boasts only 122kW at the engine (100rwkw) in factory form. Our next step was to install +30% injectors. There is a step change in performance with this upgrade and needs a retune. With a few changes we managed to get 246rwkw (330hp at the wheels) and 900nm so an excellent result. The current setup is running +70% injectors and has 311rwkw and over 1000nm. The 76mm core will make that even easier, with larger end tanks and better internal flow for high boost. To make space for the intercooler core, the air conditioner piping has to be rerouted. The components to do this are included in the kit and the task is simple enough. Spacers are provided to space the radiator back at the top. Then the condenser has a few spacers and longer bolts to allow that to also be pushed back so that nothing touches. The condenser stays in place and flexible lines take care of the rest of the relocating. Initial testing on two different cruisers resulted in the fitter doing the regassing comment on how well the system was performing. With the installation of the core up front it continues to work really well – on a hot day it is the place to be. With the ambient temperature 33-37deg a heavy tandem axle trailer was hitched up to increase load. Post turbo inlet Post intercooler inlet temperatures Normal around town driving 50-150degC 42-46degC Highway normal driving (towing) 90-160degC 48-52degC Max load up long hill 180degC 60degC Under full load thats 36% more air going into the engine, which will result in a significantly improved EGT with the same fuel or add more fuel to make even more power. For those running standard injectors this is an excellent improvement. All these results were using a 500mm wide core. We have done some more testing of the current 600mm wide core now that we can apply more load. When working hard the turbo outlet temp was pushed to 260degC and post intercooler temps were down to 70degC – a 190degC reduction. The results below show how effective the PDI front mount is compared to top mounted configuration. Compare this to one of the mid size current top mount setups that had turbo outlet temp of 130degC and post intercooler temp of 90degC – a 40degC reduction. We have tested the largest top mount offering and with around 150rwkw the post turbo temp was up to 190degC and the post intercooler temp was 75degC – a 115degC reduction. Further testing with the high flow injectors has seen the intake temperatures pulled down from 250-260degC to 70 degC on a 28degC day. That is significant. A top mount under the same conditions is expected to be no better than 140degC. If your preference is to get rid of the factory intake crossover pipe (for the EGR system) a forward facing alloy adapter off the intake manifold can be supplied. If you’re looking here then you’ve probably worked out that our front mounts will out perform any top mount intercoolers. Next thing is to work out what differentiates PDI from other front mount options. Bonnet latch is support with solid steel brackets from lower crossmember. We do not use the intercooler to absorb the shocks of bonnet bounce. We maximise the size of the core behind the grill opening and have been seeing results far more impressive than the smaller core should be producing. Our custom cast end tanks were designed to give us maximum width. While it is possible to make the core taller by going down further, an examination of the space will show that a 40mm portion of the extended core is blocked off from behind by the crossmember. The area that goes below the crossmember is then also blocked from the front by the lower painted panel and additionally it is unlikely to have any cooling from the air being pulled by the fan from behind. This portion of intercooler which does not see the same cooling as the upper part can have the affect of diluting the air charge with air that has not been cooled as much and therefore. Cast end tanks are used as airflow will be smoother, especially while going between the tank and welded pipe. No welds means a stronger tank that won’t bust open along the seems at high boost. We have chosen to go through the front panel down low as this is the simplest penetration (with an existing hole 38mm diameter) and has limited impact on the structure. The 75/79 series six cylinder radiator is mainly supported from the top mount so strength here is important. We have seen custom installs that may look great, but no only do they go through next to the radiator mounts, they also cut away a large portion of the lower crossmember, which is a major structural component. For these custom setups, although the rear of the crossmember is kept, there is no flow through a 50mm horizontal section of the core as it is blocked from the front and the back. Our stainless pipework is all one piece with no welding. The stainless routing goes over and points down at the turbo outlet so we can use a straight connection in silicon. This routing also works with a range of airboxes including factory, Moonlight and our soon to be released PDI airbox. The fact that a factory grill can be modified to fit over our intercooler is great. It means you don’t have to work out what colour to paint the intercooler core or custom grill so it looks like a Landcruiser.

products.title: Toyota Landcruiser 1HD-T Injectors
products.description: Description Toyota Landcruiser 1HD-T Injectors GTurbo offers both high-flow +30% injectors for maximum power enhancement and brand-new genuine standard injectors for reliable, consistent performance. For those aiming to extract the utmost potential from their 1HD-T engine, we highly recommend the +30% injectors, especially when paired with an ADS High Flow pump. Please note that the installation of ARP head studs is required to ensure optimal performance and durability when using these high-flow injectors. Additionally, be aware that 1HD-T engines do not mix fuel and air as efficiently, which may result in a slight increase in exhaust smoke. All prices are listed for outright purchase, providing transparent and straightforward pricing for your upgrade needs. *Please note that these Injectors are built to order ETA 6-8 weeks*
