products.title: Toyota Landcruiser 1HD-FTE Injectors (Outright Purchase)
products.description: Description 1HD-FTE Injectors (Outright Purchase) Upgrade your Toyota 1HD-FTE engine in the HDJ100 or HDJ79 Land Cruiser with our high-flow injectors, trusted by leading experts in the Australian diesel performance industry. These injectors are engineered to unlock the full power potential of your 1HD-FTE engine, ensuring optimal fuel delivery for peak performance. Key Features: Proven Performance: Our high-flow injectors are the preferred choice for achieving precise and reliable power gains, trusted by industry leaders. Easy Installation: Each injector set comes with injector seats and return rail washers, making installation straightforward and hassle-free. Tailored Power Options: Std Injectors: Standard Genuine New Injectors (do not come with fitting kit) +30% Injectors: Ideal for turbocharger setups, these injectors deliver 250-330whp and 700-800wNm, perfect for those looking to enhance power without overhauling the entire system. +70% Injectors: For those aiming for maximum power, these injectors provide 350-400whp and 800-1000wNm, making them perfect for high-performance builds. *Please note that these Injectors are built to order ETA 6-8 weeks*

products.title: PDI Landcruiser VDJ 76/78/79 Series Front Mount Intercooler Kits
products.description: Description PDI Landcruiser VDJ 76/78/79 Series Front Mount Intercooler Kits PDI has convinced us the PDI Landcruiser VDJ79 Front mount intercooler is the best choice for those looking to improve and sustain their max power or want to help the engine maintain its power delivery when run under constant high load. · Works with any bull-bar and winch installation – no cutting like other models. · Has all of the core above the bumper and bull-bar for exposure to cool air. On standard injectors, a late model dual cab has made 220rwkw with the assistance of our PDI front mount. In a single quick run you can do that with other intercoolers but our kits have shown they can repeat this many times due to the superior heat dissipation. The PDI Landcruiser VDJ79 Front mount intercooler provides the best intercooling for both high load and low speed work. The core sits close to the condenser which results in air being pulled through by the engine’s main cooling fan. Tests we’ve done have shown the drop in post intercooler intake air temperature was 3x greater with the PDI intercooler than the best of the aftermarket top mount options available. The intake air temperatures were cooler at all speeds.

Unmatched Boost Response: The HZ-G200 Titan is designed for rapid spool, achieving 20psi of boost by 1400RPM with complementary modifications and tuning. Boost Range: Operating efficiently from 9-25psi, the HZ-G200 Titan is capable of 25psi by 3000RPM and 20psi up to 4000RPM, offering exceptional top-end power potential. products.title: PDI 200 Series Landcruiser Front Mount Intercooler Kit
products.description: Description PDI 200 Series Landcruiser Front Mount Intercooler Kit The PDI front mount for the 200 series is custom designed for the 200 series. The end tanks wrap around the factory components and aim to provide cool air under high load situations to maintain torque and power when its most needed. The core is pushed back close to the radiator and condenser to get maximum air flow. With the release in 2019 of the Mk2 design the results have been amazing, making it a critical ingredient, if pushing 400hp at the wheels or doing heavy towing. In fact the first upgraded turbos for the 200 series were not developed until we had released a front mount kit. PDI currently offer 2 options: Mk2 Standard is 610x320x76mm. This design is slightly bigger and requires room to run the pipe across the front to get air from the passenger side turbo into the intercooler. Mk2 Slimline is 610x285x76mm. The core is slightly smaller vertically so we can do away with the pipe across the front and give room for the current range of bull-bars with winches. Additionally we have updated the centre bracket and provided the option of a HD transmission cooler or to keep the factory transmission cooler. Pipework is all stainless steel for longevity and durability. Quality USA made Breeze clamps and silicon is thick 5ply to ensure the setup is trouble free. This is the next generation for even more cooling ability and with enhancements such as: • improved drivability and performance increase across the rev range. • recessed design for max draw through from main engine fan for better slow speed cooling • transmission cooler location improved to sit directly behind the grill to prioritise cooling. • easier fitting. To confirm the clearance for the Std model PDI intercooler you will need 90mm in front of the lower radiator support. Additionally you will need 145mm (towards drivers side in RHD vehicle) from the 8mm mounting bolt to ensure clearance around the bullbar mount. The 200 series Landcruiser is a solid vehicle with good power and torque, suitable for towing heavy loads in comfort. When considering performance upgrades, the first step in performance should be an ECU reflash, which is an effective and simple solution where boost and fuel are increased above standard – both of these will result in an increase in inlet air temperature. If you wish to maintain the thermo fan at the front then 2 lugs are on the passenger side of the intercooler to assist in the mounting of a Spal VA10-AP10/C-61S 12V. This is on the cold side of the intercooler so will still allow cool air to reach the condenser under most driving conditions. We suggest not running any other brand of thermo fan, regardless of rating. Why go front mounted? Toyota placed the intercooler on the top of the engine since it met the requirements they had for the standard power ratings on these engines for most users. It also helped to keep production and assembly costs lower. It was not chosen as the most effective solution. Where efficiency is required to achieve good results (from smaller engines) manufacturers delivered the vehicles with front mounting intercoolers such as Hilux, Prado, D-Max, Colorado, Ford Ranger and many others. With the standard top mount intercooler, the 200 series performance suffers with increased ambient temperature and load. While towing, the constant higher boost produces more heat than can be dissipated by a top mounted intercooler. At low speed the problem is worse, as the design of the front ducting for the factory intercooler is sealed to below the top of the grill so hot air from the engine is trapped around the core until you start moving. Placing any obstruction (such as a bullbar) in front of the entry at the top of the grill additionally affects getting any cool air moving over the core. We’ve never heard of a top mounted radiator and that’s because the cold air isn’t there. Testing, performed on a VDJ70 series, running the same engine and intercooler as the 200 series and tuned to around 150rwkw (similar to the 200 series) showed that (at full load) the factory top mount was able to cool the pressurised inlet air charge from around 180-190degC down to 88degC. A quality aftermarket top mount further brought this temp down to 75degC – a 15% drop in maximum temperature. On the same vehicle, our PDI front mount was tested and the temperature reached a maximum of 47degC, which is a 46% drop in temperature, being over 3x more effective than a quality aftermarket upgraded top mounted intercooler. The benefit of front mounting is even greater with further power increases as the boost is higher and the heat to be removed increases. The 76mm thick core is huge, utilising the large frontal area on a full size Landcruiser to maximise cooling, improve air fuel ratios and drop your EGT. The setup is ideal for safely optimising your performance aims or for towing applications and requires minimal modification for installation. The kit brings the air charge from the two turbos into the drivers side and runs across through the intercooler. The outlet has a single feed back into the engine bay to go through either the OEM twin throttle bodies or our single entry design. The dual entry allows your EGR system and soft shutdown to remain in place. The single entry is a neater installation and will give better low and mid throttle response. For chipped or re-flashed 200 series they can make over 200rwkw, but with very rich mixtures and expected high exhaust temps. Improved intercooling will bring reduce EGT by leaning out the mixtures. This is especially true for those doing any high load or low speed work with their 200 series as air flow over the top mount is reduced. The front location is where the coolest air is, with limited heat soak from the engine. Even at low speed or when stationary, on the dyno, our PDI front mounted intercoolers can be expected to give the most consistently high power and torque results. Once on the road it only gets better. Too many times it’s been said that top mounts work better at low speed. We have yet to see a top mounted intercooler to compete with the efficiency and found that top mounted intercoolers efficiency deteriorates rapidly at high load typically seen when trying to go faster. We have kits available to send out. SINGLE ENTRY OR DUAL ENTRY The single and dual entry kits use the same intercooler and same hot side piping to the turbo – only the cold side piping is different. The factory setup has two throttle bodies facing left and right which go into the factory top mounted intercooler. The dual entry option connect into both of these, but splits the outlet from the intercooler. The single entry removes the butterflies and the section they bolt to, which also has the feed from the EGR (exhaust gas recirculation emissions system) so the EGR input becomes blocked off with a plate and will not flow any exhaust gases into the intake. For all 200 series and post 2013 VDJ79/76/78 the two throttle bodies must be plugged back in to prevent the engine throwing codes and de-rating the power. For early 70 series they can be left off the engine with an ECU reflash to clear the fault from them not being connected. We supply a bracket to mount the throttle bodies and hang either side of the single entry intake adapter. Reason to go with the single entry kit Chasing max responsiveness and have high flow turbos. The factory throttles are only fully open when your foot is flat to the floor. The rest of the time they are moving to assist with EGR flow. Looking to have the neatest intercooler piping, with less connections. Reason to go dual entry (or why not to go single entry): Want to keep the EGR system connected to intake to meet emissions requirements. Want to keep the butterflies (throttle valves) in the system to give smooth shut down, maintain factory setup and for those with auto transmission, maintain the ability to shut down the engine in case it ever starts to run on its own fumes (this is a low probability, but high risk outcome).
products.additionalInfo: Additional information Weight 29 kg Dimensions 92 × 45 × 32 cm Core Design Orignial, Slimline Intake Option MK2 Single Entry, MK2 Dual Entry Upgraded Transmission Cooler Intercooler Kit Only, Intercooler Kit with Upgraded Heavy Duty Transmission Cooler

products.title: 12H-T 12H-G380 Titan
products.description: Description 12H-G380 Titan This gives your engine improved low-down response, with a dramatically improved power level. This turbo will make slightly more power at the same fuel setting when compared to the 12HT-G300 Green. Its design boost is 32psi and can be operated efficiently from 16 – 35psi. Fitting a boost controller and boost gauge will allow you to increase boost over the preset 20-25psi. A 12HT-G380 Titan turbo combined with a customised tune of the factory injection pump (without removal), you can expect 400-450nm of wheel torque and 100rwkw to 120rwkw. Installations with a large intercooler, 3” exhaust, custom injection pump, high flow injectors and an upgraded air box and feed to turbo have yielded results as high as 180rwkw and torque over 650nm at the Wheels. Please note that the GTurbo 12HT-G380 has an inlet size of 3.5 inches, compared to the factory’s 2.75 inches, and the factory bottom support bracket cannot be installed. Its design and boost is 28psi, preset to 22psi and can be operated efficiently from 16 – 32psi. Fitting a boost controller and boost gauge will allow you to increase boost over the preset to 35psi. 15psi is typically available from 1900rpm if the tune and setup are complimentary. products.title: Toyota Landcruiser HD-G380 Titan
products.description: Description Toyota Landcruiser HD-G380 Titan HD-G380 Titan Performance expectations Introducing the GTurbo HD-G380 Titan, the latest evolution in turbocharger technology, replacing the renowned HD-G350 Red. Engineered with cutting-edge advancements, the HD-G380 Titan promises unmatched performance and durability for your vehicle. Key Features: Advanced Aerodynamics: The HD-G380 Titan features updated aerodynamics, optimising airflow for smoother, more powerful performance. Experience enhanced efficiency and power with every drive. Lower Inertia: With reduced inertia, the HD-G380 Titan delivers quicker spool times for rapid acceleration and immediate throttle response. Super Alloy: The compressor wheel is made from a super alloy, the HD-G380 Titan ensures exceptional strength and durability. This robust foundation guarantees longevity, even under extreme conditions. TITAN Coating: The Compressor wheel has an aerospace-grade ultra-hard non-stick coating. This advanced coating reduces friction, enhances resistance to high temperatures and corrosion, and ensures reliability. HD-G380 Titan Summary This turbocharger provides towing grunt, great response and amazing power all in one. Its design and boost is 28psi, preset to 22psi and can be operated efficiently from 16 – 35psi. Fitting a boost controller and boost gauge will allow you to increase boost over the preset to 35psi. 15psi is typically available from 1600rpm if the tune and setup are complimentary. Free 1 Year Warranty included. 1HD-T (HDJ80) Standard, the HDJ81 1HD-T produces 290Nm of wheel torque and 76-80rwkw. With an HD-G380 Titan combined with a customised tune of the factory injection pump (while in the car), you can expect 400-550Nm of wheel torque and 120rwkw to 135rwkw, with up to 150kW when used with an efficient intercooler. Boost should reach a minimum of 9psi at 1500rpm when tuned correctly without intercooler or 14psi with intercooler. Installations with a large intercooler, 3” exhaust, custom injection pump and an upgraded air box and feed to turbo have yielded results as high as 180rwkw and torque over 700Nm at the wheels. 1HD-FT (HDJ80) Standard, the HDJ81 1HD-FT produces 295Nm of engine torque and 80-88rwkw. With a GTurbo HD-G380 Titan combined with a customised tune of the factory injection pump (while in car), you can expect 450-600+Nm of wheel torque and 125rwkw to 150+rwkw, with up to 180kW when used with an efficient intercooler and a custom pump. Boost should reach a minimum of 9psi at 1500rpm when tuned correctly without an intercooler or 14psi with an intercooler. Installations with a large intercooler, 3” exhaust, custom injection pump, high flow injectors and an upgraded air box and feed to turbo have yielded results as high as 220rwkw and torque over 800Nm at the Wheels. 1HD-FTE (HDJ70 / HDJ100) Standard, the HDJ70 series produces 295Nm of Wheel torque and 90rwkW while the HDJ100 produces 380nm of wheel torque and 110-120rwkw. With a GTurbo HD-G380 Titan combined with our custom programmed electronic control module/chip and our +30% High Flow Injectors, you can expect around 700-850Nm of wheel torque and 180rwkw to 230rwkw. This assumes a quality performance intercooler, a 3” exhaust and an upgrade to the air filtration system (airbox) and feed to turbo. With +70% injectors, you can expect 250-280rwkW and 850-1000Nm of wheel torque. Additional costs are required for tuning and installation. products.title: Nissan Patrol TD42 GTurbo – TD-G380 Titan
products.description: Description Nissan Patrol TD42 GTurbo – TD-G380 Titan TD-G380 Titan Performance Expectations Introducing the GTurbo TD-G380 Titan, the latest evolution in turbocharger technology for the TD42 engine. Designed to replace the renowned TD-G350 Red, the TD-G380 Titan takes performance and efficiency to new heights. Key Features: Advanced Aerodynamics: The TD-G380 Titan features updated aerodynamics, optimising airflow to deliver smoother, more powerful performance at higher boost levels. Lower Inertia: With reduced inertia, the TD-G380 Titan delivers quicker spool times for rapid acceleration and improved throttle response, ensuring seamless power delivery. Super Alloy: The compressor wheel is crafted from a high-strength super alloy, providing exceptional durability and reliability under extreme conditions. TITAN Coating: The compressor wheel features an aerospace-grade ultra-hard, non-stick coating, reducing friction, improving high-temperature resistance, and ensuring long-lasting performance. TD-G380 Titan Summary The TD-G380 Titan delivers exceptional towing power, improved response, and outstanding top-end performance in one robust turbocharger. Its design boost is 28psi, preset to 22psi, and it can operate efficiently between 14 to 36psi. Fitting a boost controller and boost gauge allows for boost adjustments over the preset level. The TD-G380 Titan features a round mouth 3.5” entry and a 2” outlet. Supplied with the turbo is an oil line fitting that includes a JIC 4mm connector for the pressure feed and a ¾” hose tail for the outlet drain. Performance Expectations: The factory TD42 engine produces ~380Nm of torque and ~89rwkW. With the TD-G380 Titan combined with a customised in-car tune of the factory injection pump, you can achieve 500-550Nm of torque and 115-150rwkW. With additional supporting modifications, such as a large intercooler, 3” exhaust, upgraded injection pump, and high-flow airbox, power outputs as high as 220rwkW and torque exceeding 850Nm at the crankshaft have been achieved. Warranty: Backed by a Free 1-Year Warranty for complete peace of mind. products.title: Toyota Hilux/Prado 2.8 1GD-FTV GD-G250 Titan
products.description: Description Toyota Hilux/Prado 2.8 1GD-FTV GD-G250 Titan Introducing the GTurbo GD-G250 Titan for the 1GD-FTV in the N80 Hilux and GDJ150 Prado, the latest evolution in turbocharger technology, replacing the renowned GD-G250 Green. Engineered with cutting-edge advancements, the GD-G250 Titan promises unmatched performance and durability for your vehicle. GD-G250 Titan provides towing grunt, with superior low rpm grunt and efficiency compared to the original turbocharger Key Features: Advanced Aerodynamics: The GD-G250 Titan features updated aerodynamics, optimising airflow for smoother, more powerful performance. Experience enhanced efficiency and power with every drive. Lower Inertia: With reduced inertia, the GD-G250 Titan delivers quicker spool times for rapid acceleration and immediate throttle response. Super Alloy: The compressor wheel is made from a super alloy, the GD-G250 Titan ensures exceptional strength and durability. This robust foundation guarantees longevity, even under extreme conditions. TITAN Coating: The Compressor wheel has an aerospace-grade ultra-hard non-stick coating. This advanced coating reduces friction, enhances resistance to high temperatures and corrosion, and ensures reliability. Performance Expectations: The GD-G250 Titan designed boost rating is 28psi, operating efficiently from 16-32psi (at <40C turbo intake air temperature, >95kPa turbo intake air pressure), with 30psi typically available from 1600rpm when the tune and setup are complimentary. Accurate tuning is essential for reliability, efficiency, and performance. Standard performance for the 1GD-FTV is around 360nm of wheel torque and 100rwkw (130kW Model) or around 410nm of wheel torque and 135rwkw (150kW Model). With the GD-G250 Titan combined with our custom remap, you can expect around 500-550nm of wheel torque and 220rwkw to 150rwkw. Installations of GTurbo Airbox, large intercooler, 3” exhaust and upgraded injectors have yielded results as high as 170-180rwkw and torque over 650nm at the wheels. Please note that the performance figures are based on using a turbo-back exhaust system. Performance will be slightly lower if the DPF is retained. Supporting Modifications: Common supporting modifications include a GTurbo Airbox, PDI Front mount intercooler, exhaust upgrade and GTurbo high-flow injectors. Additional costs are required for tuning and installation. Free 1 Year Warranty included. 2 Years Warranty when installed alongside a GTune. This delivers immediate throttle response and increased torque, making it ideal for low-boost applications. Boost Range: Operating efficiently from 9-25psi, the HD-G200 Titan is capable of 25psi by 3000RPM and 20psi up to 4000RPM, offering exceptional top-end power potential. Enhanced Flow and Efficiency: While the HD-G333 Titan offers greater peak flow, the HZ-G200 Titan delivers superior response, making it an excellent choice for low-boost applications. The kit includes 1 x HZ-G200 Titan 1 x 1HZ Turbo oil/gaskets/studs fitting kit 1 x 1HZ GTurbo Manifold Does not Include Plumbing 1 Year Warranty included. This dyno sheet features a HZJ79 equipped with a HD-G200 Titan(10.3psi), a factory non-compensated injector pump, a front-mount intercooler, and a 3” exhaust, running on 35” Toyo Open Country tyres.

products.title: Toyota Hilux KD-G300 Titan
products.description: Description Introducing the GTurbo KD-G300 Titan, the next generation in turbocharger technology, designed to deliver exceptional mid and top-end response while making class-leading power. This turbocharger, a refined upgrade from the G320 Gold, incorporates state-of-the-art advancements to maximise performance and reliability. Key Features: Advanced Aerodynamics: Optimised for superior airflow and enhanced efficiency. Lower Inertia: Provides rapid spool times and instant throttle response. Super Alloy Base: Ensures exceptional strength and durability. Aerospace-Grade Coating: Reduces friction, resists high temperatures and corrosion, ensuring long-lasting performance. Performance Expectations The KD-G300 Titan turbocharger targets excellent mid and top-end response, capable of exceeding the performance of modified six-cylinder and V8 engines. It features a high-flow turbine wheel, larger and more efficient compressor wheel, upgraded thrust bearings, a 30% stronger main shaft, and a high-temperature-rated VNT system. Designed for a boost of 34psi, it operates efficiently from 10-37psi. With the standard injection pump and +60% GTurbo injectors, expect power increases to around 180-220rwkW and torque to over 700nm. Installations with a high-flow injection pump or overdrive kit, large intercooler, 3” exhaust, and upgraded injectors can achieve up to 230rwkW and over 900nm at the crankshaft. Packages KD-G300 Titan Turbo: $3490 Complete Drive-in/Drive-out Packages: Available upon request Common supporting modifications include an exhaust upgrade, front mount intercooler, upgraded Airbox, and high-flow injectors. Manual gearboxes require a top-spec clutch, and automatic gearboxes require a shift kit. These are available through GTurbo in Perth or any of our agents nationally. Contact us to discuss the best upgrade options for your vehicle. 1 Year Warranty on all products. Additional costs apply for tuning and installation. Upgrade to the GTurbo KD-G300 Titan and experience the pinnacle of turbocharger performance. -Turbo doesn’t include a stepper motor or gaskets. products.title: Toyota Landcruiser HD-G400 Titanium
products.description: Description Introducing the GTurbo HD-G400 Titanium, the epitome of strength and reliability in turbocharger technology. Engineered with a titanium compressor wheel, this turbocharger sets new standards for durability and performance. Titanium Excellence: The GTurbo HD-G400 Titanium Turbo boasts a compressor wheel made of titanium, renowned for its unrivalled strength and resilience. This cutting-edge material ensures exceptional performance and reliability. Unleash the Power: Experience the outstanding towing capabilities of the GTurbo HD-G400 Titanium Turbo. With its impressive response, this turbocharger delivers instant acceleration, providing an exhilarating driving experience. From low-end power to top-end performance, it excels in every aspect. Boost Beyond Boundaries: Designed to handle high boost pressures, the GTurbo HD-G400 Titanium Turbo offers a maximum boost rating of 47psi. It comes preset to 22psi. Additionally, it operates efficiently from 16 to 47psi up to 3000rpm, and achieves 35psi by 4000rpm, given a turbo intake air temperature below 35°C and a turbo intake air pressure exceeding 98kPa.. Optimised Performance: Unlock the full potential of your engine with the GTurbo HD-G400 Titanium Turbo’s exceptional performance capabilities. With the right tune and setup, it delivers 30psi of boost typically available from 1750rpm, ensuring strong low-end torque. Additionally, it reaches an impressive 40psi by 2000rpm. Warranty and Assurance: We are confident in the quality and durability of the GTurbo HD-G400 Titanium Turbo. To ensure your satisfaction and peace of mind, it comes with a free 2-year warranty. This warranty covers any potential issues and demonstrates our commitment to delivering a reliable and long-lasting product. Upgrade your vehicle with the GTurbo HD-G400 Titanium Turbo and experience unrivalled strength and reliability. Enjoy the benefits of exceptional towing capabilities, instant response, and impressive top-end power. Rest easy knowing your investment is protected by our 2 Year Warranty. 1HD-T (HDJ80) Standard, the HDJ81 1HD-T produces 290Nm of wheel torque and 76-80rwkw. With an HD-G400 Titanium combined with a customised tune of the factory injection pump (while in the car), you can expect 400-550Nm of wheel torque and 120rwkw to 135rwkw, with up to 150kW when used with an efficient intercooler. Boost should reach a minimum of 9psi at 1600rpm when tuned correctly without intercooler or 14psi with intercooler. Installations with a large intercooler, 3” exhaust, custom injection pump and an upgraded air box and feed to turbo have yielded results as high as 180rwkw and torque over 700Nm at the wheels. 1HD-FT (HDJ80) Standard, the HDJ81 1HD-FT produces 295Nm of engine torque and 80-88rwkw. With a GTurbo HD-G400 Titanium combined with a customised tune of the factory injection pump (while in car), you can expect 450-600+Nm of wheel torque and 125rwkw to 150+rwkw, with up to 180kW when used with an efficient intercooler and a custom pump. Boost should reach a minimum of 9psi at 1600rpm when tuned correctly without an intercooler or 14psi with an intercooler. Installations with a large intercooler, 3” exhaust, custom injection pump, high flow injectors and an upgraded air box and feed to turbo have yielded results as high as 220rwkw and torque over 800Nm at the Wheels. 1HD-FTE (HDJ70 / HDJ100) Standard, the HDJ70 series produces 295Nm of Wheel torque and 90rwkW while the HDJ100 produces 380nm of wheel torque and 110-120rwkw. With a GTurbo HD-G400 Titanium combined with our custom programmed electronic control module/chip and our +30% High Flow Injectors, you can expect around 700-850Nm of wheel torque and 180rwkw to 230rwkw. This assumes a quality performance intercooler, a 3” exhaust and an upgrade to the air filtration system (airbox) and feed to turbo. With +70% injectors, you can expect 280-300+rwkW and 900-1000+Nm of wheel torque. products.title: Toyota Hilux/Prado 2.8 1GD-FTV GD-G300 Titan
products.description: Description Toyota Hilux/Prado 2.8 1GD-FTV GD-G300 Titan Introducing the GTurbo GD-G300 Titan, the latest evolution in turbocharger technology, replacing the GD-G300. Engineered with cutting-edge advancements, the GD-G300 Titan promises unmatched performance and durability for your vehicle. G300-GD provides Midrange grunt, with superior low-midrange rpm grunt and efficiency compared to the original turbocharger Key Features: Advanced Aerodynamics: The GD-G300 Titan features updated aerodynamics, optimising airflow for smoother, more powerful performance. Experience enhanced efficiency and power with every drive. Lower Inertia: With reduced inertia, the GD-G300 Titan delivers quicker spool times for rapid acceleration and immediate throttle response. Feel the thrill of instantaneous power at your fingertips. Super Alloy Base: Built with a super alloy base, the GD-G300 Titan Titan ensures exceptional strength and durability. This robust foundation guarantees longevity, even under extreme conditions. TITAN Coating: The Compressor wheel has an aerospace-grade ultra-hard non-stick coating. This advanced coating reduces friction, enhances resistance to high temperatures and corrosion, and ensures reliability. Performance Expectations: The GD-G300 Titan’s designed boost rating is 36psi, operating efficiently from 16-36psi (at <40C turbo intake air temperature, >95kPa turbo intake air pressure), with 30psi typically available from 1800rpm when the tune and setup are complimentary. Accurate tuning is essential for reliability, efficiency, and performance. The standard performance for the 1GD-FTV is around 380nm of wheel torque and 100-135rwkw (depending on the model). With the GD-G300 Titan combined with our custom remap, you can expect around 500-550+nm of wheel torque and 150rwkw to 160rwkw. Installations with a large intercooler, GTurbo High Flow Airbox, 3” exhaust, and upgraded injectors have yielded results as high as 180+rwkw and torque over 700+nm at the wheels. Please note that the performance figures are based on using a turbo-back exhaust system. Performance will be slightly lower if the DPF is retained. This unit can be used as a direct replacement for the factory unit with no modification to the tune/ECU and is designed to function optimally with or without the DPF. Supporting Modifications: Common supporting modifications include an upgraded Intercooler, exhaust upgrade, upgraded Airbox, induction plumbing, and GTurbo high-flow injectors. Free 1 Year Warranty included. 2 Years Warranty when installed alongside a GTune.

products.title: Nissan Patrol TD42 – Injector Pump (GQ) (Outright Purchase)
products.description: Description Nissan Patrol TD42 – Injector Pump (GQ) Enhance your Toyota Land Cruiser’s performance with the ADS Injection 11mm and 12mm High-Flow Pumps, designed to meet the demands of serious diesel enthusiasts. Whether you’re aiming for moderate power gains or pushing the limits of your engine, these pumps offer the precision and reliability needed for optimal fuel delivery and performance. Key Features: 11mm High-Flow Pump: Ideal for setups targeting 180-220rwhp. Delivers about 200rwhp at 20psi and a 21:1 air-fuel ratio. Capable of reaching up to 230rwhp, making it perfect for those seeking significant power without pushing the pump to its limits. 12mm High-Flow Pump: Suited for those aiming for 200-300rwhp. Effortlessly produces 230rwhp and beyond, with a capacity to reach up to 300rwhp, providing robust performance for high-power builds. Choosing the Right Pump: Selecting the correct pump for your setup is crucial for achieving your performance goals without sacrificing efficiency. The 11mm pump is perfect for moderate power levels, offering reliable performance up to 230rwhp. However, if you’re targeting 230rwhp or higher, the 12mm pump is the ideal choice, delivering the power you need with less strain on the system. Upgrade to the ADS Injection 11mm or 12mm Pump and ensure your engine is running at its best, with the right balance of power and efficiency tailored to your needs. *PLEASE READ *This Injector Pump is outright purchase NO EXCHANGE, NO CORE CHARGE *Please note that these pumps are be built to order ETA 3 – 4 weeks

products.title: Toyota Landcruiser VD-G333 Titan
products.description: Description GTurbo VD-G333 Titan Introducing the GTurbo VD-G333 Titan, the latest evolution in turbocharger technology, replacing the renowned VD-G320 Green. Engineered with cutting-edge advancements, the VD-G333 Titan promises unmatched performance and durability for your vehicle. Key Features: Advanced Aerodynamics: The VD-G333 Titan features updated aerodynamics, optimising airflow for smoother, more powerful performance. Experience enhanced efficiency and power with every drive. Lower Inertia: With reduced inertia, the VD-G333 Titan delivers quicker spool times for rapid acceleration and immediate throttle response. Super Alloy: The compressor wheel is made from a super alloy, the VD-G333 Titan ensures exceptional strength and durability. This robust foundation guarantees longevity, even under extreme conditions. TITAN Coating: The Compressor wheel has an aerospace-grade ultra-hard non-stick coating. This advanced coating reduces friction, enhances resistance to high temperatures and corrosion, and ensures reliability. Performance Expectations: The VD-G333 Titan designed boost rating is 30psi, operating efficiently from 16-33psi, with 30psi typically available from 1500rpm when the tune and setup are complimentary. Accurate tuning is essential for reliability, efficiency, and performance. Standard performance for the VDJ70 series is around 380nm of wheel torque and 100-120rwkw. With the VD-G333 Titan combined with our custom remap, you can expect around 800-900nm of wheel torque and 190rwkw to 220rwkw. Installations of GTurbo Intercooler Fan Kit it or large intercooler, 3” exhaust, GTurbo Powerpipe (intake pipe), NPC1600Nm Clutch and upgraded injectors have yielded results as high as 260rwkw and torque over 1000nm at the wheels. Please note that the performance figures are based on using a turbo-back exhaust system. Performance will be slightly lower if the DPF is retained. This unit can be used as a direct replacement for the factory unit with no modification to the tune/ECU and is designed to function optimally with or without the DPF. Supporting Modifications: Common supporting modifications include a GTurbo Intercooler Fan kit or PDI Front mount intercooler, exhaust upgrade, upgraded airbox, replacement turbo intake pipe (GTurbo Power Pipe), NPC1600Nm Clutch and GTurbo high-flow injectors. Free 1 Year Warranty included. 2 Years Warranty when installed alongside a GTune.

products.description: Description Toyota Landcruiser VD-G380 Titan VD-G380 Titan – High-Flow Performance for Big Power VDJ Builds Introducing the GTurbo VD-G380 Titan, the latest evolution of our high-performance VDJ turbocharger range. Based on the proven success of the VD-G350 Titan, the VD-G380 takes things further, delivering the same sharp throttle response, greater top-end power, and unmatched reliability under load. Installations of GTurbo Intercooler Fan Kit it or large intercooler, 3” exhaust, GTurbo Powerpipe (intake pipe), NPC1600Nm Clutch and upgraded injectors have yielded results as high as 290rwkw and torque over 1000nm at the wheels. Peak figures are achieved using a turbo-back exhaust system. Retaining the factory DPF will slightly reduce output. products.title: Toyota 200 Series Landcruiser VDTT-G450 Titan (Twin Turbo Pair)
products.description: Description Toyota Landcruiser VDTT-G450 Titan Introducing the GTurbo VDTT-G450 Titans for the VDJ200, the next evolution in high-output turbocharger performance, replacing the renowned G450VDTT Red. Engineered for exceptional low-end torque, strong mid-range acceleration, and sustained high-boost capability, the VDTT-G450 Titans are designed to deliver serious performance while maintaining durability and reliability under extreme operating conditions. Key Features: Advanced Aerodynamics:The VDTT-G450 Titans incorporate revised aerodynamic profiling to optimise airflow and compressor efficiency. The result is stronger mid-range torque, improved high-rpm performance, and enhanced overall engine response. Lower Inertia:Reduced rotational mass allows for faster spool characteristics and improved transient response, delivering boost earlier and more progressively under load. Super Alloy Construction:The compressor wheel is manufactured from a high-strength super alloy, engineered to withstand elevated shaft speeds and high boost pressures without compromising structural integrity. TITAN Coating:The compressor wheel features an aerospace-grade ultra-hard non-stick coating. This advanced surface treatment reduces friction, improves resistance to heat and corrosion, and enhances long-term durability. Upgraded Turbine & VNT System:A revised turbine profile combined with GTurbo’s custom VNT calibration provides improved boost control, stronger upper-rpm airflow, and stable high-load performance. Performance Expectations: The VDTT-G450 Titans designed boost rating is 35psi, operating efficiently from 16–36psi up to approximately 3200rpm (at <40°C turbo intake air temperature and >95kPa turbo intake air pressure). Boost levels of 30psi are typically achievable from around 1750rpm when the tune and supporting modifications are complementary. Accurate tuning is essential for reliability, efficiency, and performance. Standard performance for the VDJ200 series is approximately 550Nm of wheel torque and 155rwkW. With a set of VDTT-G450 Titans combined with a custom remap, you can expect around 900Nm of engine torque and approximately 230rwkW. Installations of GTurbo Airbox, GTurbo Intercooler Fan Kit or large intercooler, 3” exhaust and upgraded injectors have yielded results as high as 320+rwkw and torque 1200nm at the wheels. Please note that the performance figures are based on using a turbo-back exhaust system. Performance will be slightly lower if the DPF is retained. Supporting Modifications: Common supporting modifications include a GTurbo Airbox, GTurbo Intercooler Fan kit or PDI Front mount intercooler, exhaust upgrade and GTurbo high-flow injectors. Pricing & Warranty: Turbos are supplied on an exchange basis.Additional costs apply for tuning and installation. Free 1 Year Warranty included. products.title: Toyota 200 Series Landcruiser VDTT-G450 Titanium (Twin Turbo Pair)
products.description: Description Toyota 200 Series Landcruiser VDTT-G450 Titanium (Twin Turbo Pair) Introducing the GTurbo VDTT-G450 Titaniums for the VDJ200, our most advanced twin-turbo upgrade for the 200 Series LandCruiser. Based on the proven VDTT-G450 Titan platform, this premium package features billet titanium compressor wheels for maximum strength and extreme heat resistance. Engineered for long-haul towing, high-power touring, and serious performance builds, the VDTT-G450 Titaniums represent the highest specification bolt-on turbo upgrade available for the 1VD-FTV twin-turbo platform. Key Features: Billet Titanium Compressor Wheels:Manufactured from aerospace-grade titanium, the compressor wheels provide exceptional heat resistance and structural integrity at elevated shaft speeds and boost pressures. The result is improved durability under sustained thermal load and high-RPM operation. Reinforced Internal Components:The VDTT-G450 Titaniums incorporate reinforced thrust bearings and 30% stronger main shafts to support increased boost pressure and torque output while maintaining reliability in demanding applications. Custom High-Flow Turbines:Revised turbine geometry improves exhaust energy utilisation, supporting stronger mid-range torque and sustained upper-RPM airflow. Next-Generation VNT System:Upgraded variable nozzle control enhances boost response, drivability, and high-load stability across a broad operating range. Performance Expectations: Standard performance for the VDJ200 twin-turbo platform is approximately 550Nm of wheel torque and 155rwkW. With a set of VDTT-G450 Titaniums combined with a custom ECU remap, you can expect approximately 850–900Nm of wheel torque and 230–240rwkW. Boost levels of up to 30psi are typically achievable from around 1750rpm when tuning and supporting modifications are complementary. Accurate tuning is essential for reliability, efficiency, and performance. Installations incorporating a GTurbo Airbox, PDI Front mount intercooler or GTurbo Intercooler Fan kit, 3” turbo-back exhaust system and GTurbo high-flow injectors have achieved results of up to 350rwkW and over 1200Nm of wheel torque. Performance figures are based on turbo-back exhaust configurations. Outputs may be slightly lower where the factory DPF is retained. The VDTT-G450 Titanium is compatible with both DPF and non-DPF setups. compatible with both DPF and non-DPF setups. Supporting Modifications: Common supporting modifications include a GTurbo Airbox, GTurbo Intercooler Fan kit or PDI Front mount intercooler, exhaust upgrade and GTurbo high-flow injectors. Ensures clean, unrestricted air supply for improved response and power. GTurbo 2.5” Aluminium Air Inlet Upgraded intake pipe designed to remove factory restrictions and improve compressor efficiency. Enhances turbo spool and peak airflow. New Genuine MAF Sensor Included as a preventative upgrade to ensure accurate airflow readings and consistent performance. New Genuine Boost Control Solenoid Ensures stable, reliable boost regulation — essential for high-boost ZD30 builds. NPC1000 Heavy-Duty Clutch (Manual Transmission Only) Designed to handle the significant torque increase, providing smooth engagement and long-term strength. Performance Results (Once Tuned) With professional dyno tuning and correct installation, the ZD30 CRD Warrior Package delivers up to: 200 kW at the wheels 700 Nm at the wheels Expect massive midrange torque, crisp throttle response, cooler running temperatures, and confident power delivery across all conditions. products.title: VDJ70 Warrior Package

Option 1: Pre-DPF Model (2007–2016 VDJ70 Series) Package Inclusions GTurbo VD-G400Ti Titanium Turbocharger (Ball Bearing or Journal Bearing):Massive flow capacity with a titanium billet compressor for extreme durability, high-boost stability, and exceptional top-end performance. GTurbo Brand new Pro95 Injectors: High-flow injectors engineered for the non-DPF 1VD-FTV fuel system, ensuring clean delivery and precise atomisation at high load. GTurbo Twin Fan Kit: Actively cools intake charge temperatures during heavy towing or off-road use, ensuring stable performance and EGT control. GTurbo Power Pipe: High-flow alloy intake upgrade for sharper turbo response. GTurbo VDJ79 High-Flow Airbox: Heavy-duty alloy design with GTurbo’s signature double-seal system for superior dust and water protection. 1VD-FTV Turbo Gasket Kit & Injector Fitting Kit: Ensures a leak-free, professional-grade installation. Performance Results (Once Tuned) With professional tuning, the Warrior Package (Pre-DPF) delivers up to 400 HP and 1100 Nm, offering relentless midrange pull, rapid turbo response, and sustained top-end power, perfect for heavy towing, performance touring, or sand and dune work. Option 2: DPF Model (2016 onwards VDJ70 Series) Package Inclusions GTurbo VD-G400Ti Titanium Turbocharger (Ball Bearing or Journal Bearing) GTurbo Brand New Piezo High-Flow Injectors: Upgraded DPF-compatible injectors with increased flow and precise pulse control for strong, clean power.
